story:
Is it difficult for you to fall asleep? Do you wake up during the night feeling unbearably warm or too cold? Quality sleep is something we all need, and we know how frustrating it can be when you're not getting enough. Now there is a natural solution to help you get to sleep and stay asleep, so you feel better rested. The nuyu™ Sleep System works like your body's natural circadian rhythm, making sleep temperature more comfortable for a better night's sleep.





According to the National Sleep Foundation, nearly 60% of Americans and many more worldwide suffer from sleep problems1. Studies from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention have shown that lack of proper sleep is linked with chronic disease – including coronary heart disease, diabetes, anxiety and obesity2.



Sound sleep is an integral part of optimizing your health and well being. Helping you sleep more comfortably is our goal. As life moves faster, we need to feel our best – and we can't be our best without good sleep. The Health o meter™ nuyu™ Sleep System helps you to get better night's sleep so you are ready to take on the day.



Unlike other apps or devices that simply monitor and report on our sleep, the Health o meter™ nuyu™ Sleep System uses a patent-pending temperature algorithm that works like your body's natural circadian rhythm to help you fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer, and wake up more refreshed.


For a detailed report on the effects of temperature and sleep, please see this report

Skin Deep: enhanced sleep depth by cutaneous temperature manipulation 

conducted by the Department of Sleep & Cognition, Netherlands Institute for Neuroscience and VU University Medical Center of Clinical Neurophysiology, Neurology and Medical Psychology, Amsterdam, the Netherlands. 




The nuyu™ Sleep System operates at a low decibel level so you can sleep peacefully. Further, the sleep mat is made with an ultra-soft cotton/polyester blend, and when placed beneath your fitted sheet, it's undetectable to the body. You'll only feel the warming and cooling comfort it's meant to provide, with no bumps or ridges.



The app provides initial temperature recommendations, but you can also customize and adjust settings to your optimal comfort level.




To get started, open the app and complete your personal profile. The nuyu™ Sleep System will recommend a starting temperature, and then the proprietary sleep algorithm will start to work like your circadian rhythm by cycling the temperature throughout the night! When you're ready to sleep, just let the system know. When you awake, rate your sleep quality using the app and, if necessary, adjust the temperature to optimize your comfort level.


After conducting our initial field testing of 20 users with reported sleep problems, we discovered that our users reported a:

Here’s how to do it.

1.  Just log into your account on Indiegogo and get your custom link, or share by using the social media buttons on the left side of the campaign page.

2.  If you choose the custom link, just copy and paste that into your pinterest page, Instagram, Facebook or an email so that link is used in all of those places.
If you use the Facebook, Twitter or G+ buttons, those will automatically create a custom link that connects to your individual account.

3.  When somebody clicks on that link and makes a purchase, we can track that link back to your individual account and know that the referral came from you. It’s all tracked through the Indiegogo website metrics so we know who you are to get the free product to you.

4.  If you’ve already purchased one of these products, we will refund your purchase price or send you another for free.



Introducing: 




The nuyu™ personal activity tracker helps you get active, and stay active by tracking your steps, calories burned, distance, and your light, deep, and restless sleep.  Your personal activity data is wirelessly sent to your smart phone or tablet – the same app you use for the sleep system - so you can keep a record of how active you've been the past day, week, month, or year.  Easy to set up, your nuyu™ activity tracker features an OLED screen which allows you to view your data throughout the day without looking at your phone.  Wear on your wrist, in your pocket, or clipped under your clothing.  Challenge yourself each day to reach your goals, whatever they may be, with nuyu™














The Health o meter™ nuyu™ Sleep System is a revolutionary new device, which unlike other apps or devices that simply monitor and report your sleep, this system works like your body's natural circadian rhythm to make you more comfortable so you can get a better night's sleep. Selecting a perk allows you to pre-order the nuyu™ Sleep System at a huge discount.






The Health o meter™ nuyu™ brand is part of Jarden Consumer Solutions. You may not recognize us by name, but you probably are familiar with our brands, such as Mr. Coffee®, Oster®, Crock-Pot®, FoodSaver® and now nuyu™. Knowing we are part of a family of trusted brands, you can be assured that the team behind the nuyu™ Sleep System has experience to build durable, reliable and smart products.

So why are we turning to the Indiegogo community for support?
It is because the nuyu™ Sleep System is an innovative new way to help people sleep and feel better, and we believe the Indiegogo community of early adopters shares our belief that technology can help solve the problems that affect millions and millions of people worldwide. The Indiegogo community gives us the opportunity to gain valuable feedback to continue to make improvements based on advice and commentary from people like you. We think it's a smarter way to innovate and we'd like your help.




The Health o meter™ nuyu™ team is dedicated to not only improving your sleep, but to also assist in all things for wellness. This is why we've created an ecosystem of products and services including an activity tracker, a wireless scale and personalized online coaching plans (coming soon). This interconnected ecosystem can help you manage your own personal wellness goals with unique tools to help you achieve them.

Please visit www.healthometernuyu.com to find out more.



Does Each Person Need Their Own Sleep System?
 Yes, because everyone sleeps at different temperatures and for different lengths of time. Sleep is a personal experience, and in order to get the best sleep, the temperatures should be personalized to you!
How Does The Sleep System Know What Temperature Is Best?
 Since everybody is different, the nuyu app will make a recommendation based on our testing and research. If the initial recommendation is not comfortable for you, you can customize the temperature to find the one you like best.
How Does The Temperature Cycle Work?
 There are three cycles: When you are going to sleep, the sleep system warms you. Then, it cools you down during the night, and then warms you again, naturally.
Is The Sleep System Sensing My Body Temperature?
 No, but it doesn't need to. The Sleep System works like the body's natural circadian rhythm. It's designed to help keep your body comfortable.
Can I Change The Temperature Any Time I Want?
 Yes, you have full control of what temperature your sleep system is set to. You can make adjustments at any moment during the night, and your sleep system will adjust to your needs.
What Is The Circadian Rhythm?
 Often referred to as the "body clock", the circadian rhythm is a 24-hour cycle that tells our bodies when to sleep and regulates many other physiological processes. This internal clock is affected by environmental cues, like light and temperature. When one's circadian rhythm is disrupted, sleeping and eating patterns can be interrupted. The best sleep you experience is when your body follows the natural circadian rhythm temperatures.
How Does The Sleep System Work?
 The sleep system uses a patent pending temperature algorithm that works like the body's circadian rhythm. It cycles the temperature of the sleep pad to help keep you comfortable throughout the night.
Do I Need A Special Size To Fit My Bed?
 No, the system uses a one size pad that is designed to fit under the torso area.
Why is the pad sized only for my torso?
 The Sleep System works with your body's core temperature. By applying incremental heating or cooling to your torso, studies have shown a direct relationship to sleep quality. Your legs are important for temperature regulation to allow your body to adjust itself to the right "micro climate" under your covers. Simply put, it's why you stick your foot out from under your covers when you are hot and curl up when you are cold.
COMPATIBILITY
What phones and operating systems is the system compatible with?
Android:
The list was too long to post, but it is compatible with most models except for HTC One Max, Android version 4.4.2, and HTC One Remix, Android version 4.4.2. But, we are working on getting those phones online. 
PURCHASING AND SHIPPING
Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my payment?
 No, shipping is free within the U.S. At this time, we ship only to US addresses within the 50 states and are unable to ship to international addresses, American Samoa, Guam, Puerto Rico, and the U.S. Virgin Islands. We do not ship to APO/FPO post office boxes and P.O. Box Addresses.
How will I know my nuyu sleep system has shipped?
 You will receive an email confirmation with a tracking number.
How long will shipping take?
 We want you to get a better night's sleep as quickly as possible. Generally, once you receive your shipping confirmation, you should receive the system within 3-5 business days.
How much are the taxes?
 Sunbeam Products, Inc. d/b/a Jarden Consumer Solutions will remit all State and local taxes and taxes on shipping and handling fees ("Taxes") to the extent required by applicable law. Sunbeam Products, Inc. d/b/a Jarden Consumer Solutions shall remit such Taxes whether or not you were charged for such Taxes on the applicable invoice.
What if I change my mind?
 During the campaign, the Indiegogo Support team can take care of all refund requests. Purchasers can contact support@indiegogo.com directly, before the campaign deadline, for prompt processing of all such requests.
How can I reach out to your team directly?
 We love connecting with our customers, so if you'd like to reach someone on our team directly, contact us. Be sure to include your phone number in your note if you'd like to speak with someone as quickly as possible.
What's your warranty policy?
 We want you to be 100% satisfied with your purchase. If, for any reason, you are not completely satisfied with your nuyu™ purchase, you may return your nuyu™ Sleep System to us within 90 days of receipt, and all other nuyu™ item(s) to us within 30 days of receipt for an exchange or refund of the purchase price (less the restocking fees).
Every sleep system comes with a 5-year limited warranty.
For Details, click here.
How do I return an order?
 Please click here for information on returning an order.
I've returned my item. How soon will I receive my refund?
 Refunds on returned item(s) will be issued in the same payment form as tendered at the time of purchase and should appear as a credit in your account within 1 – 2 billing cycles.


  1. The National Sleep Foundation. Annual Sleep in America Poll Exploring Connections with Communications Technology Use and Sleep. Retrieved July, 2014.
    http://sleepfoundation.org/media-center/press-release/annual-sleep-america-poll-exploring-connections-communications-technology-use-
    2.  
  2. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention. Sleep and Chronic Disease. Retrieved July, 2014.
    http://www.cdc.gov/sleep/about_sleep/chronic_disease.htm
    The Center for Disease Control and Prevention ("CDC") is a governmental body of the United States Government. The above statement does not indicate any form of endorsement or approval from the CDC of this product.

story: Even though German Moya was born with spina bifida, eventually losing his ability to walk in his early teens, he feels like a normal kid. Whether playing his guitar, talking with his family, or anything else, his wheelchair is important to everything he does. It is the one thing he needs to get around independently as possible, but now it is breaking down. Though he had been able to get parts to repair the chair, it is reaching the point that it must be replaced. This will entail a round of bodily measurements for the custom fit needed in a new chair. The cost of this new chair will total between $5000 and $9000 —certainly not an amount that German’s family can afford on their own. With that in mind, he wants to begin saving funds before his chair breaks down completely.

With that in mind, he wants to begin saving funds before his chair breaks down completely.

story:
WELCOME TO OUR MISSION

The world of fitness can be a tedious and frustrating one.  A continuous journey of ups and downs, but unfortunately for most people that journey is really a vicious cycle of "so-so" results due to the vast amounts of information on the latest diets and workout trends.  People become extremely frustrated with failed attempts of transforming their body and creating a healthier, fitness inspired lifestyle.

With this mission, we are hard-set on inspiring and changing 20,000 lives in the first year with our innovative results-driven fitness programs.

Element 5 Fitness is not for the "average" gym goer.  We do not attract the "typical" fitness crowd. Make no mistake, we are different.

Our fitness family, a.k.a. "Fitness Warrior Tribe", is serious when it comes to achieving fitness goals. We are driven, committed, and invested in our minds, bodies, and health - not just today, but for the long haul.

ELEMENT 5 FITNESS

Founded in 2007 by industry veteran Rommel Ryan Acda, a.k.a. “Chief Fitness Scientist”, the Kirkland-based company has established itself as a unique fitness transformation center.  Element 5 Fitness has earned World Fitness Elite Personal Trainers of the Year for 2011, 2012 and 2013, Kirkland KOMO Communities Best Fitness Boot Camp in 2011, and has been featured in USA Today, the Independent UK, and on the World Fitness Elite TV Show as seen on NBC, CBS, ABC, and FOX network affiliates around the country.

Element 5 Fitness is also a proud member of the number one fitness franchise in the nation, Fitness Revolution.

ABOUT ROMMEL RYAN ACDA

"An unwavering mindset that supports your goals; no-bull workouts that stick to the basics; a sensible nutrition plan that works for you – this is the trifecta of fitness, plain and simple. When these come together, you are unstoppable. But know that if the first one fails, all else will crumble.”

Driven by his parents’ struggle with metabolic disorders, Rommel officially became a first class fitness professional to teach his parents how to live a healthier lifestyle. This passion has since extended to any individual who desires to improve their quality of life. In his mission with Element 5 Fitness he believes he can inspire change in your life with an integrated fitness lifestyle. With now thirteen years experience in the industry, Rommel holds a Bachelor of Science in Exercise and Sports Science and these top rate certifications:

  • Certified Strength and Conditioning Specialist through the National Strength and Conditioning Association
  • Certified Health and Fitness Instructor through the American College of Sports Medicine
  • Certified Muscle Activation Techniques Trainer (graduate of the MAT 10-month Specialist Internship in Denver, CO)
  • Z-Health R-Phase and I-Phase Certified Performance Specialist
  • Certified Level 2 Underground Strength Coach under world renowned strength coach and creator of USC Zach Even-Esh
  • Certified TACFIT Field Instructor Level 1

He is also the creator of “Fit In A Hurry” The Ultimate Busy Person’s Workout Program. 

Rommel recently joined a select group of the world’s leading health and fitness entrepreneurs to co-write the health and fitness book titled, 3 Steps To YOUR BEST BODY In Record Time: America’s Leading Fitness Experts Reveal The Proven 3-Step System To The Body You Always Wanted…In Minimum Time.


This thought-provoking book features advice from health, fitness, and wellness experts from across the globe - covering subjects such as total body health, fitness, and nutrition. The book is designed to help people find a breakthrough fitness strategy that works for them. 3 Steps To YOUR BEST BODY In Record Time offers proven strategies to help people achieve the level of fitness they have always desired. Rommel contributed a chapter titled “Essential Ground Rules For Effective Ten-Minute Workouts.”

MEET THE TEAM (a.k.a. Ambassadors of FUN)

BACK TO THE MISSION: Mission Fit-Possible 20K

Over the next year we have committed ourselves to helping more people like you achieve their optimal health - and if your dream body comes as a result as well - well that would just be the icing on the cake!

We believe the journey of health and fitness is simple. All you need ARE the right tools and the right coaching. Our goal is eliminate all the confusion in the journey to a healthier, fitter, leaner, stronger body, but to also forge a strong mindset.  

A strong and mind and strong body you are proud of and inspires you to share your journey with friends, family, and anyone else that has been struggling to achieve success with their fitness goals.  

Our approach to mind and body transformation goes beyond the surface.  We want people to experience “life-changing” fitness.  To achieve mind and body milestones and breakthroughs that will further empower you.  A "re-invented" self that is willing to serve as additional support in this mission.

A mission that was inspired by our fitness tribe to initially help transform 20,000 lives in the next year so that we can further inspire change and create a fitness revolution.

WHAT WE NEED

Simply put - you are making an investment.

Your investment will go toward:

  • Expanding our team of highly qualified fitness coaches and ambassador's of fun with a passion for helping people like you become rockstar "Fitness Ninjas"
  • Upgrading our equipment and facility to provide a seamless stage to allow members to embody quality movement, technique, fun, and energy
  • Acquiring additional resources to allow us to create quality offline and online programs and support for members to maximize results anywhere
And most importantly...
With the extra support, we intend to create an unparalleled experience that further engages our tribe members and prospective members local and long-distance.

So...are you ready?

The time to act is now.


To YOUR success and the spirit of kaizen,

Rommel Ryan Acda

3-Step System To The Body You Always Wanted…In Minimum Time.
This thought-provoking book features advice from health, fitness, and wellness experts from across the globe - covering subjects such as total body health, fitness, and nutrition. The
book is designed to help people find a breakthrough fitness strategy that works
for them. 3 Steps To YOUR BEST BODY In Record Time offers proven strategies to
help people achieve the level of fitness they have always desired. Rommel
contributed a chapter titled “Essential Ground Rules For Effective Ten-Minute
Workouts.”
MEET THE TEAM (a.k.a. Ambassadors of FUN)


BACK TO THE MISSION: Mission Fit-Possible 20K
Over the next year we have committed ourselves to helping more people like you achieve their optimal health - and if your dream body comes as a result as well - well that would just be the icing on the cake!We believe the journey of health and fitness is simple. All you need ARE the right tools and the right coaching. Our goal is eliminate all the confusion in
the journey to a healthier, fitter, leaner, stronger body, but to also forge a
strong mindset.  
A strong and mind and strong body you are
proud of and inspires you to share your journey with friends, family, and
anyone else that has been struggling to achieve success with their fitness
goals.  Our approach to mind and body transformation
goes beyond the surface.  We want people
to experience “life-changing” fitness. 
To achieve mind and body milestones and breakthroughs that will further
empower you.  A "re-invented"
self that is willing to serve as additional support in this mission.
A mission that was inspired by our fitness
tribe to initially help transform 20,000 lives in the next year so that we can
further inspire change and create a fitness revolution.
WHAT WE NEED
Simply put - you are making an investment.Your investment will go toward:
Expanding our team of highly qualified fitness coaches and ambassador's of fun with a passion for helping people like you become rockstar "Fitness Ninjas"
Upgrading our equipment and facility to provide a seamless stage to allow members to embody quality movement, technique, fun, and energy
Acquiring additional resources to allow us to create quality offline and online programs and support for members to maximize results anywhere

And most importantly...
With the extra support, we intend to create an unparalleled
experience that further engages our tribe members and prospective members local and long-distance.

So...are you ready?The time to act is now.To YOUR success and the spirit of kaizen,Rommel Ryan Acda

story:
Its all about this:

Hi all, im Olivier and im 32 years old, and i married with Leen.

I have 3 sorts of cancer since 2014. Since then i have been teated we with some mixture of several chemotherapy-products. Some worked, some not. 

Now, the cancer has returned very fast and aggressive . There is an experimental chemotherapy that could help and comes from another country; Plus, the costs are all for us and it isn't cheap. A total cost calcullates itself fast to a big 20.000€; So thats why i call your help! Our county doesn't pay back experimental medicals.

story:
Juno Beach Pier, Juno Beach, FL


My Story...

My name is Jeff Biege. I’m a landscape/seascape water photographer living in Jupiter, Florida. I'm also a lifelong surfer/diver and former professional kiteboarder who has a deep love and passion for the ocean and the natural world. Over the past 30 years I have been involved with  many nonprofit organizations, with a dream of  making a difference and being part of the solution!

My campaign involves my photography and using it as a tool to help a growing number of nonprofits. Over the past year that I have been pursuing my photography as a full time job, I have been approached by several nonprofit organizations    asking  to use my images for fundraising purposes.  I have donated my work to all of them.

In the coming two months,  I will be undertaking two nonprofit projects for the Share The Stoke Foundation and the Surfrider Foundation. In order to continue helping these organizations, I need to obtain more funding.  Your support is key to allowing me to donate my time, travel, and photography to these great causes. Most people never get to see what lies beneath the ocean’s surface. I believe that sharing images of this underwater life is a key step in conserving it. My hope is that bringing these images to others will instill change and facilitate the protection of our beautiful blue planet.  

Green Sea Turtle at Loggerhead Marine Life Center, Juno Beach, FL


Help Me Be A Part of the Solution

  • I will travel to Colombia in early November to document a mission for the Share The Stoke Foundation (sharethestokefoundation.org).  We will be taking surfboards, clothes, wetsuits, etc., to boys and girls in northeast Colombia. We will also work in the communities of the small coastal towns to help improve infrastructure. And last but not least, we will instill ocean conservation and environmental awareness in these children and families.The images I shoot with be framed and auctioned off at a fundraiser when we return from the trip!

  • On November 15th, 2014, I will prepare, print, mat, and frame images for the Surfrider Foundation fundraiser in Palm Beach, Fl. The Surfrider Foundation USA is a U.S. 501 grassroots non-profit environmental organization that works to protect and preserve the world's oceans, waves, and beaches. My image of 11 time world champion surfer Kelly Slater will be auctioned off to raise money. This image was shared by Kelly Slater himself on his Facebook page and received 10k likes with over 200k views! Really hoping to get this image signed by Kelly:)                                                                                                                        
  • In December 2014 I have an underwater shoot planned with a large local conservation agency and another project awaiting funding. I hope to continue working with Share The Stoke and the Surfrider Foundation while adding new organizations to my client list  . My long term goal is a planned book project towards the end of 2015! 

Nurse Shark at Blowing Rocks Nature Preserve, Jupiter, FL


The Impact

Your contribution will directly support these photo shoots, the gear needed, and the time and travel. It will also help fund prints, frames, and presentation of the images that these wonderful organizations will later use for their own fundraising purposes.

Underwater Sea Life, Jupiter, FL


Risks & Challenges

I realize that I face challenges. Choosing this path can be risky - pursuing my passion of using my photography to help nonprofits can be an uphill battle. Much of the time, funding for these nonprofits is slim and grant money for environmental research is even slimmer. But I know I have the skills and drive to make this happen! My ability as a photographer continues to grow the more I shoot, and I hope to find grants and other moneys available to conservation photographers as I push ahead. 

Checkered Puffer Fish, Jupiter, FL


Other Ways You Can Help

Want to help, but don't have the financial means? I have been there.  You can help me by sharing my cause, doing research about these nonprofit organizations, and spreading the word on their behalf. Learn more by visiting:

http://sharethestokefoundation.org/

http://www.surfrider.org/

http://www.marinelife.org/

These organizations need manpower and people to donate time as well as money. Thank you for your time and have a great day!

Double Rainbow Juno Pier, Juno Beach, FL


Moon Jelly Fish, Jupiter, FL

story:
Whether you are managing work, house and lifestyle, or searching for ways to stay healthy, Pearls Band is here to help you in all of your needs. It helps keep you up to date with important, but commonly forgotten, health data such as: blood pressure, heart rate, the amount of oxygen in your blood, fatigue level, and more!
 








Pearls Band is the stylish and affordable health-monitoring band you've been searching for.


Stop ignoring your health! It will help you develop the habit of stay healthy with checking health records when it affects negatively.

Pearls: A valuable friend for your Health

Pearls understands your body's requirements and helps you to maintain a balance between work and health. It provides you with a simple solution that could have a huge impact on the quality of your life.
With your phone you can analyze your health graph to see your blood pressure, heart rate, and blood oxygen, all without stepping away from your place.



 




It not only offers heart rate monitoring, but also monitors Blood Pressure and oxygen levels of your blood and much more. Pearls Band can be set up to remind you of your target heart rate. Our APP/APK can achieve heart rate synchronization, with embedded data statistics and management software for you to see. It also includes an accurate report of your Systolic and Diastolic Blood Pressure. Systolic BP refers to the pressure inside your arteries when your heart is pumping; diastolic pressure is the pressure inside your arteries when your heart in the meantime between beats. 

STAY HEALTHY, STAY WEALTHY, WITH THIS STYLISH AND AFFORDABLE BAND


Support us to help us provide you with a healthy life experience. Pearls Band gives you the chance to know the status of your health, and shows you how to improve it and stay healthy.

Track Your Burned Calories, Steps Taken, Blood Pressure, Levels of Oxygen in Your Blood and Fatigue Levels, everywhere, every time. Pearls Band includes a user-friendly and noiseless operation with a heavy- duty battery. Pearls Band is designed to save your peace of mind from monitoring devices, features a user-friendly design, Noiseless operation with heavy- duty battery.

A little bit of love can go a long way – do your bit to help get our project out there now! Simply share by clicking the links below or at the top of page.





How about the feeling of being healthy every morning with tracking your fitness goals?
After all, it's a great feeling- feel confident to manage your daily activities!

                      


It is like a private health secretary for you. Isn't it exciting to see how your fitness status improving from time to time, while at the same time you’ll be able to spot that change? All of your data is securely stored, allowing you to check your health records without regular health check-ups. Stay healthy, live long with track your fitness goals with the help of the breakthrough technology of Pearls Band.

 

You can analyse your health graph on your phone and can check Blood Pressure,Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen on your phone without stepping away from your place.



Live your life to the fullest. Track your progress and set high goals to achieve. Pearls Band features the Best display under sunlight, it’s waterproof, features heavy-duty battery life and encourages you to achieve demanding goals in your life.



Mind your Style and choose your favorite color. Pearls Band truly reflects its users' personalities, so you can customize it the way you want. Pearls Band is very functional, and great fun to use.

Keep yourself healthy and happy, for you and your family.

When Blood Pressure Rate persistently remains abnormal, be ready to face the consequences. Certain conditions like Heart Stroke, Congestive Heart failure and low immune function can be triggered causing lifelong illness.

This is why being aware of your blood pressure rates and having the chance to track them down, are so critical for your quality of life. This is why we're making Pearls band.


From design to prototyping and testing, Pearls band has come a long way.


You can choose your favorite color from its color range:
Red, Purple, Blue & Black






After years of research and being in the making stages -we're only months away from activating our manufacturing line. Take a look at how far we've come:


We have made multiple iterations of our sensor hardware and are working on:

Merging industrial design and electrical engineering work streams

Developing the awesome user experience for the mobile app.

Increasing the sophistication of our machine learning algorithms through more testing and experimentation.



We will use raised funds to accelerate our product Manufacturing , Mobile Application debugging and testing. The funds we receive from you will enable us to work on it and its new feature's development process.



Risks & challenges
At this point of the project the risks are at a very low level because we have planned and taken care off all aspects that involve the mass production of Pearls Band.

Technology: Our technical experts ensures and confident that they can deliver and scale production if necessary.

Design: The design on the band is already done and the factory will develop the straps according to specifications.

Challenges
Technology: We have 3 years of experience in developing technological products but it is always a challenge to keep up with the latest tech trends and implementations.

Design: Designing team acquired 15 years of experience in developing high quality designs for wearable.

Tradition: If the campaign scales it will be a challenge to deliver the unique cases according to the timeline. But we are confident that with our alliances we can manage to deliver the necessary demand.

story:
I am a 58 year old Veteran male currently living in the city. I share my residence with my wife, bird, cat & my 2 dogs. I have one son who is 36. He has given me 4 beautiful grandchildren, three living and one deceased. I have ridden motorcycles my entire life, up until two years ago, when I had to retire the passion. At one point I was involved with drag racing and held a record at Englishtown, New Jersey. I had also driven truck for 37 years, both local and cross country. When my profession took me coast to coast, I chose to live in several different states I had visited. I recently surrendered my Class A license, which included ALL of the endorsements.

I am totally disabled, beginning with bi-polar disorder. In 1993, I was involved in a motorcycle accident, where I nearly lost my leg. Doctors told me IF they could save it, I would most likely not be able to walk again. Fortunately, I defied odds and was not only able to walk, but could ride again! In 2009, I had an automobile accident and was pronounced dead at the scene. I had a severe head injury, resulting in 43 staples to close my wound. In direct relation to the head injury, I suffered seizures, which have since disappeared. A few years ago, I was diagnosed with spinal stenosis. Many of my disks are herniated. Surgery to repair my spine is not an option as I was diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis 2 years ago. Most days I am 40% functional from early morning until about noon, though there are days I am not functional at all. I used to require assistance when walking, but am now completely wheelchair-bound. At times, I can transfer from wheelchair to a regular chair or bed, but many times need 2 people to help steady me on either side. I find I lose my balance and fall on a frequent basis.

Being on a fixed income is definitely not easy. Medical costs have soared tenfold in last two years. I am continually visiting both my neurologist and primary care physician, not to mention blood work, MRI’s and x-rays. I am currently receiving IV infusions once a month, with a hefty price tag of $7000. My insurance does pick up a portion of that, but I am responsible for the rest. Prescriptions are a large part of my medical bills. I am on several different medications to help control my pain.

I was given a wheelchair by the VA, which was constructed for another Veteran who passed away before using it. While it assists me in my daily life, it is too small for my 6''2" frame. I do my best to make it work for me. I have a difficult time driving as it is hard for me to lift my feet at times.

I recently purchased a handicap van. While it does have a wheelchair lift, it does not have some of the features I require to give me the independence I so desperately seek. I need to have hand controls installed along with an automatic closer for the ramp doors & need to have the driver seat removed & a track installed to accommodate my wheelchair. I also need a set of tie downs for the chair.

My wife is also disabled, with Avascular Necrosis & asthma. She is able to walk some, but will be in a wheelchair full time soon, herself.

I was told by many Indiegogo is the route to take to try and raise the necessary funds for what I need to have done to my van to make it accessible for both my wife and I to drive it.

I thank you in advance for taking the time to read my story, and perhaps donate to my cause.

story:
March 17th Update: $3,750 Stretch Goal!


McGill Quidditch wants to thank everyone who donated to help us reach our goal of $3,000 in less than 15 days! Since we still have ten days left in our campaign and $12,000 to raise, we’re introducing a stretch goal. We're aiming to  raise $750 more, which will get us to 25% of our total costs! 

We’ve added a new perk: Pie-a-Player for $5! Pick your favourite team member to get pied in the face and we’ll send you a video you can treasure forever.

If we make our stretch goal: If we make our total goal of $3,750, our entire Nationals roster will attend a full day of classes dressed as a Quidditch player: this means jersey, shorts, socks, headband, and, of course, broom!

Help us reach our new goal by donating today!


Who We Are

The McGill Quidditch Team, founded in 2008, is the oldest Quidditch Team in Canada and since then we have maintained our reputation as one of the top teams in the country. Currently ranked 1st in Canada, we took back our title of Eastern Regional Champions this February and now we're setting our sights on winning the inaugural Canadian National Championship!

On March 28th-29th we'll be flying across the country to Burnaby, British Columbia to compete for the title of National Champions. This is the first-ever Canadian Nationals, and teams from both the East and West will face each other for the first time to claim the top spot. We're eager to test ourselves against new Western competition, but we can't do it alone!

What We Need & What You Get

Our plane tickets are booked, protein shakes blended, and we're training hard to be competition-ready. But the expense to send 20 players from Montreal to British Columbia is enormous, and we need your help to get there.

The total cost of plane tickets, accommodation, and on-site transportation will be $15,000, and we hope to raise $3,000 (20%) of that through this Indiegogo campaign. 

In exchange for your donation we are offering some fantastic perks: 

  • Prank-a-Player of your choice
  • Personalized Serenades
  • Handknit scarves 
  • T-shirts & Bro-tanks
  • Hand-carved magic wands
  • Team Polar Plunge
  • AND MORE

The Impact

Our team has proved ourselves against the top teams of the Eastern Canadian region, and we're currently ranked #1 in the country. We know we can take our competition to the next level and bring home the National title. With a little help from you, we can get there.

Your contribution will help us reduce the cost-per-player to just $300 each, which is our ultimate fundraising goal. We are incredibly grateful for anything you can contribute since it gets us one step closer to competing on a National stage!


Other Ways You Can Help

Check our facebook page for events and merchandise:

 https://www.facebook.com/McGillQuidditch

AND SHARE THIS PAGE WITH ALL YOUR FRIENDS

BROOMS UP!

We’ve added a new perk: Pie-a-Player for $5! Pick your favourite team member to get pied in the face and we’ll send you a video you can treasure forever.

If we make our stretch goal: If we make our total goal of $3,750, our entire Nationals roster will attend a full day of classes dressed as a Quidditch player: this means jersey, shorts, socks, headband, and, of course, broom!Help us reach our new goal by donating today!Who We AreThe McGill Quidditch Team, founded in 2008, is the oldest Quidditch Team in Canada and since then we have maintained our reputation as one of the top teams in the country. Currently ranked 1st in Canada, we took back our title of Eastern Regional Champions this February and now we're setting our sights on winning the inaugural Canadian National Championship!On March 28th-29th we'll be flying across the country to Burnaby, British Columbia to compete for the title of National Champions. This is the first-ever Canadian Nationals, and teams from both the East and West will face each other for the first time to claim the top spot. We're eager to test ourselves against new Western competition, but we can't do it alone!What We Need & What You GetOur plane tickets are booked, protein shakes blended, and we're training hard to be competition-ready. But the expense to send 20 players from Montreal to British Columbia is enormous, and we need your help to get there.The total cost of plane tickets, accommodation, and on-site transportation will be $15,000, and we hope to raise $3,000 (20%) of that through this Indiegogo campaign. In exchange for your donation we are offering some fantastic perks: 
Prank-a-Player of your choice
Personalized Serenades
Handknit scarves 
T-shirts & Bro-tanks
Hand-carved magic wands
Team Polar Plunge
AND MORE
The ImpactOur team has proved ourselves against the top teams of the Eastern Canadian region, and we're currently ranked #1 in the country. We know we can take our competition to the next level and bring home the National title. With a little help from you, we can get there.Your contribution will help us reduce the cost-per-player to just $300 each, which is our ultimate fundraising goal. We are incredibly grateful for anything you can contribute since it gets us one step closer to competing on a National stage!Other Ways You Can HelpCheck our facebook page for events and merchandise: https://www.facebook.com/McGillQuidditchAND SHARE THIS PAGE WITH ALL YOUR FRIENDSBROOMS UP!

story: We adopted Bushkit from Liana Murray & Stefanie Dougherty's cat Maui. He is family to us, as they are, and as all animal friends to their families! Mama volunteers a lot; heart rather than cash flows, and daughter so badly wants to keep her beloved kitten, and not give it up for adoption...especially as it is from her dear friend! All money raised will go to pay for his procedure at Rose City Veterinary clinic Dove Lewis emergency clinic. <3

story:
Natural Flow
combines the best of ancient wisdom and modern science/technology to foster a community that empowers people who menstruate to make informed decisions for their unique body, lifestyle, and values.

We support the widespread use & awareness of Sustainable Menstrual Options (SMOs), including washable cloth pads, menstrual cups, and sea sponge tampons.  SMOs are better for the environment, are healthier for your body, and save you hundreds of dollars compared to toxic disposables.  Additionally, by using SMOs, you inherently learn more information about your unique body and cycle!  Even if you no longer menstruate (or never did), this is important information that everyone benefits from knowing (the harmful effects of disposables and the fact that sustainable alternatives exist), and you can help spread the word  :)




Washable cloth pads are also comfy solutions for incontinence.

NOTE:  All choices within a perk will be made via survey at the end of the campaign.

What We Do:

  • Host critical community dialogues (on menstrual health, body empowerment, feminism, menstruation & climate change, and more!)
  • Act as a resource for using SMOs, in person & online.
  • Provide one-on-one personalized support.
  • Work to include SMOs in health education.
  • Make more awesome options accessible in the US.
  • Model trying to be an inclusive, holistic movement by being clear about the words that we use and the messages that we amplify. We practice embodying our values (Authenticity, Love, Nonviolence, Regeneration, Resilience) in many ways, from choosing partners that we believe in to using language that affirms a range of gender identities, backgrounds, and experiences.

We source our sustainable menstrual options from partners that share our values – having a positive impact on their local and our global community.  

– Eco Femme pads
are made by a women’s collective in Auroville, India.  Sales include a Pad for Pad donation through Eco Femme’s menstrual health education programs in rural Indian schools.  Cloth pads last 5+ years and are machine or hand washable.

– Ruby Cup
works in rural Kenyan schools to donate cups through their menstrual health programs. Menstrual cups collect rather than absorb, can be worn up to 12 hours at a time, and last 10+ years!

– Holy Sponge! 
is a queer-women-owned SF Bay Area company that hand curates sponges sustainably harvested by a female diver in Florida specifically for menstrual use. Sea sponge tampons last 6-12 months and can be composted at end of life.


Learn more about Eco Femme.


Our Goal

We are raising $10,000 to promote the growth & financial sustainability of Natural Flow. We will use these funds to advance the well-being of people who menstruate through health and environmental education, access to our sustainable options, and product donations through our partners.

Your support will enable

us to catalyze the movement and expand the rethinking menstruation conversation, in part by achieving these specific goals:

  • Expand Eco Femme to 15 new retailers by the end of 2015.
  • Develop online content to be a (more) comprehensive, accessible resource by the Spring of 2015.
  • Bring the SMOs conversation to 2 community events per month & 8 SF Bay Area Schools by the end of 2015.
  • Empower at least 500 people to make the switch to SMOs

Perks

We really tried to create a range of awesome options to help provide a great fit for you, including the option to gift or donate your perk.

Perks include tools for you to start the conversation yourself (Guerilla Stickers, T-shirts!), great Sustainable Menstrual Options, Workshops, Life Coaching Sessions and the opportunity to Sponsor individual students or a whole Classroom to get comprehensive menstrual health education.

One of our perk partners, Validity Initiative is founded on the principle that All Bodies Deserve Pleasure.  No matter your physical size, ability, age, or body parts, your body deserves pleasure. You deserve pleasure – not just related to sex, though that's a great place to start!  Validity helps people pleasure their bodies, while also finding pleasure in their bodies, so everyone can love, embrace, and be proud of their bodies just as they are right now.



View the FB Album with all our sharable graphics.

Our Impact, Why We are Different

Natural Flow is a growing resource for first time users and veterans alike looking for one place to have a complete overview of all sustainable menstrual options, presented in ways that are accessible to a range of life experiences.

Natural Flow is different, because our primary mission is being a resource for the movement. Selling products we believe in is one way that we act as a resource. At the end of the day, our greatest hope is that every person has as much information as needed to make informed decisions for their own unique bodies & lives.

We’re in it for the paradigm shift! Natural Flow is on the frontline of menstrual activism, and we need your support to take the conversation everywhere:

  • People who menstruate who know there's got to be a better way, and just haven't found it yet;
  • School kids just starting to discover the power and wonder of their bodies and its changes, who deserve to know all the options upfront;
  • Organizations, educators, parents, and mentors who are already doing great work that could expand to include sustainable menstrual options and body empowerment!



We're Reclaiming the Conversation Around Blood

Blood is the flow of life.  Blood literally replenishes and distributes life – that's why viruses like Ebola and HIV want to get in on it!

Blood is a vital part of ourselves.  Menstruation is a normal natural life process, essential to creation.  How do we relate to it?  What context & perspective do we bring to our cycles?

What if we felt that powerful lifeforce & connection to where
we came from & all that will be, as we bleed each month?

Imagine this life-affirming, vital flow within you, of which menstruation is a part. Envision a relationship with menstruation and blood itself that contributes to your health, happiness, and authentic expression in the world.

#BloodHappens.


Our Contact Info:

http://naturalflow.us/
https://www.facebook.com/naturalflowus
hello@naturalflow.us
(774) 406-FLOW (3569)


Other Ways to be Involved

  • Share an enticing graphic from our Facebook Event to spread the conversation
  • Attend one of our awesome SF Bay Area and Virtual events (also listed on our FB Event)
  • Make art and/or share your menstruation story using the hashtags #BloodHappens. #NaturalFlow
  • Spread the word about our campaign, including via the IndieGoGo share links above, and as a great conversation starter for friends and people you meet throughout your day!


Risks & Challenges

We acknowledge that there will likely be unforeseen challenges and we are doing our best to build in resilient practices so that we can realize the spirit of our goal even if specifics change.

story:
Tell me more about Healer2Healer...

Healer2Healer is an organization that exchanges alternative medicine practices (acupuncture, Reiki, massage, etc.) among trained practitioners and rural communities in South America. We empower women in rural communities so they can in turn, self-reliantly provide this type of healing to their communities.


Why does Healer2Healer need these funds?

As a charity, H2H currently supports a group of 4 indigenous women. Paulina, Magdalena, Teresa, and Hilaria from Santa Cruz de Quiché, Guatemala will participate in our community clinic in Esquipulas this December 26-30. The  money  will cover their accommodations, training, clinic supplies, and transportation. They must travel over 5 hours each way to our teaching site.


Want to donate your time?

Healer2Healer invites volunteers to join us on this special trip. For more information, visit our website.

Our website: http://www.healer2healer.org/

story:
The Appalachian Apparators have done it again! In our fourth year of being a USQ official team, we have qualified for our fourth US Quidditch Cup (previously called World Cup). This tournament is the culmination of every team's hard work throughout the season. We are honored to have qualified to attend US Quidditch Cup 10, and are beyond excited to travel to Kissimmee, Florida in April.

It's no secret that the Apparators have some of the best, most dedicated fans in the world. We are absolutely indebted to your support, and we wouldn't be where we are today with you all. But we are calling on you once again to help us, and this time, we can give back with some sweet perks!

As a community team, the Apparators don't receive funding from our local university, so all of our expenses, including travel, lodging, equipment, and outfitting, come out of the pockets of our players. We've traveled a lot this year and our wallets are starting to feel the hurt. That's why we need your help!

Our cost analysis is as follows:

$450 – USQ/tournament fees

$1,000 – Transportation

$250 – Equipment

$800 – Hotels

We're not asking you to fund our entire trip; we just need a little community support to ensure that every member of the Apparators can make it to US Quidditch Cup 10. However if you so happen to want to fund our entire trip/the perks are just too good to pass up, anything extra will go toward the team and helping fund our JV player's way to the Cup too!

We've got a ton of great perks for you to choose from! In addition to our awesome Apparators apparel (including jerseys, T-shirts, and tank tops), we've also got some skilled teammates who are willing to offer their talents and wares in exchange for your help. 

Here are the items we offer and a few pictures of what's available:

OFFICIAL APPAREL & MERCHANDISE

  • "Who Do We Fly For?" Fan T-Shirt
  • "Get High / Play Quidditch" Tank
  • LIMITED EDITION Retro Cup T-Shirt
  • Apparators Jersey (with your name and number!)
  • Appalachian Quidditch stickers

 

SOCIAL MEDIA SHOUTOUTS

We love you, we love you and we don't care who knows it! If you choose one of these perks, we'll shout our thanks across the internet rather than keeping our gratitude to ourselves.

Twitter Shoutout: A little birdy told me that people still use Twitter sooooo we'll tweet you a shoutout with as much love as we can possibly fit into the 140 character limit.

Featured Fan Article: Much like the "Featured Apparator" series on our Facebook page, we'll interview you and share your story with all 2,802 of our Facebook fans!

TALENTS & OTHER

In addition, our lovely teammates have a variety of amazing and bizarre talents that you're not going to be able to pass up. Here's just a sample of what they're offering. You can see more in the "Perks" section to the right.

A Week Of Memes: You KNOW you love Brandon Poole's Facebook content. For an entire week, he'll tag you in the hottest memes the internet has to offer.

Original Fan Fiction: Guaranteed to rival "A Quidditch Romance." You choose the fandom.

Pie Us @ Nationals: You gotta.

Photoshoot: Give us your best blue steel.

Dinner and Dancing Lesson: Cash us on the dance floor how bow dah??

Dye Our Hair: SOMEBODY MAKE EM DO RAINBOW.

We'll Dye Your Hair: Color to DYE for ;)

Tattoo A Player: For the low low price of $500, our bodies are your canvases...canva....canvi?

Let us know if you have any perk suggestions – we're more than willing to accommodate requests.

*If your perk is size-specific, such as a T-shirt, expect an email from appalachianquidditch@gmail.com requesting your preferred size. 

 

And we'd love you even more if you...

  • Liked us on Facebook
  • Followed us on Twitter and Instagram
  • Gave us hugs at Nationals!

<3
-The Apparators

Photo Credit: Alex Gates, Savannah Lett, and Katelyn Benson

 

PS: Donate In Memory Of Maggie's Aloe Plant...

–

story:
Proper skincare is not only important for facial skin but all skin no matter what part of the body. This is why we at HuggingU created the world’s first back mask for flawless skin. The revolutionary design, based on the facial beauty care mask, provides skincare maintenance for your back. 

 

 

HuggingU offers the back mask in two different varieties: 17 min. Revitalizing-Peeling Back Mask & 7 min. Hydro-Detoxifying Back Mask. The Revitalizing-Peeling Back Mask exfoliates dead skin and controls excess sebum, which can lead to break outs. The Hydro-Detoxifying Back Mask moisturizes new skin for suppleness while brightening the skin tone.

 

 

 

The back has the largest surface area of skin on your body, but as it is difficult to reach, it is hard to wash and often not washed thoroughly. Additionally, as your back is often covered with clothing, the skin rarely gets a chance to breathe.

Wear the 17 min RP Back Mask and rinse after 17 minutes. Your back will be clearer and softer than ever before.

 

 

*  Click the names below to see explanations for each ingredient.

Tea Tree Oil , Orange Peel Oil, Lemon Peel Oil, Lavandin Oil, Purified Water, East Indian Lemongrass Oil, Salicylic Acid, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Hyaluraonate

 

 

 

After taking a shower, it's important to apply body lotion to all parts of your body. However, how often have you forgotten to apply lotion to your back properly because it was hard to reach? By wearing the 7 min HD Back Mask, provide moisture and nourish your skin in a simpler way. 

 

 

* Click the names below to see explanations for each ingredient.

Phyto placenta extract, Rice embryos, Rye Extract, Asiatic Pennywort Extract, Purified Water, Sea Trumpet Extract, Sodium Hyaluraonate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate

 

The 7 Min HD Back Mask is also scented with violet flowers to make your skin smell great. Apply this gentle and fragrant scent before you head out on the town.

 

 

 

Remember how your back takes up the largest portion on our body? Don't leave your back un-nourished and unhealthy. The Revitalizing-Peeling Back Mask provides treatment to your back’s acne by exfoliating dead skin and controlling excess sebum. The Hydro-Detoxifying Back Mask moisturizes new skin for suppleness while brightening the skin tone.

Bacne (Back Acne) results as a combination of excess oil, clogged pores, bacteria and inflammation. Skin needs to breathe, but as your back is nearly always covered with clothing it is a body part particularly at risk. In addition, being difficult to reach, the back is often not washed thoroughly. This allows for the accumulation of dead skin and more prone to bacterial infection. Muggy weather, over exertion, stress and excessive alcohol consumption also can be aggravating factors. 

 

 

Reducing inflammation and preventing skin irritation are key factors in the fight against bacne. Inflammation not only causes redness, but also blocks your pores while producing excess oil.
 

 

The 17 min. Revitalizing-Peeling Back Mask provides skin care by controlling excess sebum, exfoliating dead skin and fight skin infections. Tea Tree Oil can help in washing away excess sebum while Salicylic acid naturally loosens proteins in the skin to allow dead skin to shed more easily. Vitamin C shields skin from free radicals, which is why orange and lemon peel oil helps to fight skin infections.

 

The 7 min. Hydro-Detoxifying Back Mask provides skin care by moisturizing, whitening and soothing your skin. Rice embryos and rye extract contain proteins which help skin retain moisture, Phyto placenta is a rich source of nutrients to keep skin healthy, and Cynanchum Atratum Bunge extract is effective in cooling your skin.

 

 

The cynanchum atratum plant, commonly known as the swallowwort root or Bai Wei, is the key ingredient for HuggingU’s acne prevention. Used in Chinese medicine to cure fevers, cynanchum atratum has powerful cooling and anti-inflammation properties.  

 

 

New skin is radiant and blemish-free as it never has been exposed to external elements. However as new skin is exposed to external elements it begins to age. Phyto placenta is a rich source of nutrients which actively rejuvenate skin therefore preventing premature aging keeping skin bright and spot free.

 

 

 

 

Step1. Spread the back mask out, and insert your arms into the arm straps. 

Step2. Place the back mask on your back and raise the arm straps up to your shoulders. 

Step3. Ensure that the back mask is evenly spread across your back. 

 

* For the 17'RP back mask, wear it for 15~20 minutes and then rise your back thoroughly with warm water. Recommended Use: 1~2 time per week . 

* For the 7'HD back mask, wear it for 7~15 minutes. No need to rinse your back after use. 

 

With its simple design simply slip on the back mask as if you were wearing a back pack. For those who find this position uncomfortable, you can also use the back cushion for support.

 

Tip1 : As the back is sensitive to temperature, the back mask may give off a cold sensation. If you prefer a warmer sensation, simply place the back mask in the microwave for a few seconds. Make cool mask in summer, and make it warm in winter!

Tip2 : For enough results, we recommend that our product be used regularly more than one month. 

 

 

 

People who are uncomfortable and cannot comfortably flex their body can use Back Mask in any circumstance by using the Back cushion!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Developer's word

Self back mask is the world's first mask for back skin. As with any product that is the first of its kind, there may be some unforeseen hurdles. However, we have taken all steps to be sure to keep our promise with our backers. Both back mask types have been developed and have undergone thorough testing. As we wanted to set the reward levels at the lowest possible backing amount, please understand if the delivery fees appear a bit high. Thank you for your support of HuggingU!
story_txt: Proper skincare is not only important for facial skin but all skin no matter what part of the body. This is why we at HuggingU created the world’s first back mask for flawless skin. The revolutionary design, based on the facial beauty care mask, provides skincare maintenance for your back.   HuggingU offers the back mask in two different varieties: 17 min. Revitalizing-Peeling Back Mask & 7 min. Hydro-Detoxifying Back Mask. The Revitalizing-Peeling Back Mask exfoliates dead skin and controls excess sebum, which can lead to break outs. The Hydro-Detoxifying Back Mask moisturizes new skin for suppleness while brightening the skin tone.   The back has the largest surface area of skin on your body, but as it is difficult to reach, it is hard to wash and often not washed thoroughly. Additionally, as your back is often covered with clothing, the skin rarely gets a chance to breathe.Wear the 17 min RP Back Mask and rinse after 17 minutes. Your back will be clearer and softer than ever before.  *  Click the names below to see explanations for each ingredient.Tea Tree Oil , Orange Peel Oil, Lemon Peel Oil, Lavandin Oil, Purified Water, East Indian Lemongrass Oil, Salicylic Acid, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Glycolic Acid, Sodium Hyaluraonate   After taking a shower, it's important to apply body lotion to all parts of your body. However, how often have you forgotten to apply lotion to your back properly because it was hard to reach? By wearing the 7 min HD Back Mask, provide moisture and nourish your skin in a simpler way.   * Click the names below to see explanations for each ingredient.Phyto placenta extract, Rice embryos, Rye Extract, Asiatic Pennywort Extract, Purified Water, Sea Trumpet Extract, Sodium Hyaluraonate, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate The 7 Min HD Back Mask is also scented with violet flowers to make your skin smell great. Apply this gentle and fragrant scent before you head out on the town.   Remember how your back takes up the largest portion on our body? Don't leave your back un-nourished and unhealthy. The Revitalizing-Peeling Back Mask provides treatment to your back’s acne by exfoliating dead skin and controlling excess sebum. The Hydro-Detoxifying Back Mask moisturizes new skin for suppleness while brightening the skin tone.Bacne (Back Acne) results as a combination of excess oil, clogged pores, bacteria and inflammation. Skin needs to breathe, but as your back is nearly always covered with clothing it is a body part particularly at risk. In addition, being difficult to reach, the back is often not washed thoroughly. This allows for the accumulation of dead skin and more prone to bacterial infection. Muggy weather, over exertion, stress and excessive alcohol consumption also can be aggravating factors.   Reducing inflammation and preventing skin irritation are key factors in the fight against bacne. Inflammation not only causes redness, but also blocks your pores while producing excess oil.  The 17 min. Revitalizing-Peeling Back Mask provides skin care by controlling excess sebum, exfoliating dead skin and fight skin infections. Tea Tree Oil can help in washing away excess sebum while Salicylic acid naturally loosens proteins in the skin to allow dead skin to shed more easily. Vitamin C shields skin from free radicals, which is why orange and lemon peel oil helps to fight skin infections. The 7 min. Hydro-Detoxifying Back Mask provides skin care by moisturizing, whitening and soothing your skin. Rice embryos and rye extract contain proteins which help skin retain moisture, Phyto placenta is a rich source of nutrients to keep skin healthy, and Cynanchum Atratum Bunge extract is effective in cooling your skin.  The cynanchum atratum plant, commonly known as the swallowwort root or Bai Wei, is the key ingredient for HuggingU’s acne prevention. Used in Chinese medicine to cure fevers, cynanchum atratum has powerful cooling and anti-inflammation properties.    New skin is radiant and blemish-free as it never has been exposed to external elements. However as new skin is exposed to external elements it begins to age. Phyto placenta is a rich source of nutrients which actively rejuvenate skin therefore preventing premature aging keeping skin bright and spot free.    Step1. Spread the back mask out, and insert your arms into the arm straps. Step2. Place the back mask on your back and raise the arm straps up to your shoulders. Step3. Ensure that the back mask is evenly spread across your back.  * For the 17'RP back mask, wear it for 15~20 minutes and then rise your back thoroughly with warm water. Recommended Use: 1~2 time per week . * For the 7'HD back mask, wear it for 7~15 minutes. No need to rinse your back after use.  With its simple design simply slip on the back mask as if you were wearing a back pack. For those who find this position uncomfortable, you can also use the back cushion for support. Tip1 : As the back is sensitive to temperature, the back mask may give off a cold sensation. If you prefer a warmer sensation, simply place the back mask in the microwave for a few seconds. Make cool mask in summer, and make it warm in winter!Tip2 : For enough results, we recommend that our product be used regularly more than one month.    People who are uncomfortable and cannot comfortably flex their body can use Back Mask in any circumstance by using the Back cushion!          Developer's wordSelf back mask is the world's first mask for back skin. As with any product that is the first of its kind, there may be some unforeseen hurdles. However, we have taken all steps to be sure to keep our promise with our backers. Both back mask types have been developed and have undergone thorough testing. As we wanted to set the reward levels at the lowest possible backing amount, please understand if the delivery fees appear a bit high. Thank you for your support of HuggingU!

story:
A New Day For Discs:

Whether you are new to the sport or have played along side Johnny Roberts and Ken Climo, we all have those discs that are special to us, signed discs, ace discs, collector drops, or other. We at Disc Capsule are no different, and have tried many ways to display and show off our favorite discs. Hanging them in their bags on the wall was difficult to decorate around, shadow boxes were bulky and took away the ability to see an especially swirly back of a disc or bottom stamp, and hanging them on the wall unprotected left an uneasy feeling. None fit what we were trying to accomplish, and both had drawbacks that left a lot to be desired. 

Justin Gaston has been an avid disc golfer and invested member of the disc golf community for over a decade. Justin had come up with the idea for Disc Capsule a little over a year ago and had been slowly making it a reality since, but over the course of daily conversations decided it was time. An all in one device to protect your disc, that you can hang or let stand on its own like a picture frame. Disc Capsule was born and a prototype created. 

Our first model used a threaded design on the face plate, but the twist on feature was not one we were thrilled about, and went back to the drawing board. We came up with a pressure seal face plate, just push to seal the disc in, sturdy, yet easy to remove

After a few iterations, we have arrived here, and are presenting it to the community in hopes that you see what we do in it. 

Disc Capsule will be able to stand on its own, or hand neatly on the wall. UV protective and lines with foam, it provides the ultimate protection for you discs, while allowing you to appreciate the beauty of them at the same time. Universal fitment to most disc molds, and included spaces for discs of varying sizes.

What We Need & What You Get

Justin and I have put in starter funds to get us to this point, we have a working prototype, a website, and a plan for production and distribution. Right now we are raising funds for the production part, mainly the molds and printing, as well as some towards building the proper team for Disc Capsule to thrive. The first goal is $10,000 with our stretch goal being $15,000.

We have a ton of great perks that come in addition to the amount of Disc Capsules you donate for, including mystery discs, t-shirts, microfiber towels, and a Whale Sac. 

The Impact

Protecting our discs is not easy, between storage wear, sun damage, and general organization, and that doesn't give much allowance to displaying them. Disc Capsule not only protects your discs from time and the elements, but allows you to do so on display in way of your choice. UV resistant material will protect your glow discs, soft foam lining will keep them from scuffing. Hang them or stand them up, but still have easy access if you want to show them off, or even put it in the bag!

Disc Capsule will also be useful in a variety of other ways. It makes for an ultra safe way to ship a high price disc, or a great addition to a tournament player pack. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Sharing the campaign to everyone you know is a huge help! 
  • Indiegogo has share tools right on the page!

story:
Our Story
Skin Care for Athletes by Morning Indigo developed as a business without plans for a business. The original line was developed purely out of necessity. I always loved natural body products but due to the tough financial year I couldn't afford to buy my favorites, so I opted to make them for the family! With several years of work experience and training from skin care companies such as Estee Lauder and Artistry Skin Care, I went onto the internet and started searching for the raw ingredients, in small quantities, to make my necessities - soap, body butter, hair oils.

Let The Games Begin

A couple of years later, I received a flyer from Team in Training to help raise money for the Leukemia Society and in exchange they would coach me through a marathon.  So at the age of 44 I went from the couch to completing a marathon in 5 months.  I then went on to complete another marathon and triathlon with Team in Training. One thing that I noticed, due to the training, was that my skin was drying out from all of the showers, chlorine and the sun/wind exposure. Since I made body products, a teammate asked that I develop a body moisturizer that sprayed. It took a few months of research, discovering what athletes needed and what they put their skin through and which essential and carrier oils would best benefit the skin.  It hit me that it didn't make sense that an athlete would train right, eat right, get in all of their hydration and supplements just to go home and douse their skin (largest organ on the outside of their body) with chemicals.  So finally, the Tri-Body Moisturizing Spray and 3-in-1 Tri-Body Wash was developed.

The Impact
Since our launch, almost four years ago, I've earned my certification in Holistic Aromatherapy, completed 5 half-marathons, a half-Ironman triathlon and several 5ks. I am truly a late-blooming endurance athlete! The product line has also grown, having expanded from two products to seventeen offering total body care.  Skin Care for Athletes is a certified B Corporation, and our products are certified and highly rated by Environmental Working Group (ewg.org), Leapingbunny.org, Caringconsumer.org and World of Good by Ebay. Our products are rated "Excellent" on Goodguide.com and are the only organic skin care line for athletes certified vegan by PETA.  The Tri-Body Collection and our P.A.R. line (Prepare Achieve Recover) have anti-fungal/anti-bacterial properties; offers light UVA/UVB protection, all are sulfate, petrochemical, paraben and phthalate free and never tested on animals.  We were recently recognized as "Champions" by the Campaign for Safe Cosmetics and Skin Care. 

Get In The Game

With your support we will continue to provide an excellent product made from organic and natural ingredients.  Our goals for 2012 are to grow and educate our customer base, our brand and to get into more retail stores, both on-line and brick/mortar.   Here is the outline of how we will utilize the money we receive.

  1. Product Expansion.  Utilizing the one-for-one model, we are proud to launch our newest product, our organic Giving Goddess Soaps. These organic/natural 3 oz soaps come in a set of three with the individual embedded words, Faith, Hope, Love.  For each set sold, a set will be donated to women and children's homeless shelters.  Buyers of the soap will be able to have the equivalent set of soaps donated to a women's shelter of their choice or it can be left up to our company to donate it to one of our local shelters. A small portion of the money raised will cover the initial product development of raw materials, packaging and marketing.
  2. Sales and Marketing. As we make a push to get into more on-line and brick and mortar stores, we will contract with a company specializing in small business marketing and a manufacturers  sales representative. We plan to continue our social media and grass roots marketing efforts via our blog, facebook, youtube channel and twitter pages by interviewing athletes of all levels, coaches, medical experts in the sports field providing information and education on organic and green fitness products. Exhibiting and selling at 5 or more large athletic events, as we continue to put our product directly into the hands of  fitness enthusiasts. Expo fees must be paid months in advance to secure a good location.  As this is an Olympic year we are in talks with a few Olympic hopefuls regarding product only sponsorships. 
  3. Operations/Product Production. Product production covers the purchasing of such items as raw materials (oils, butters, essential oils), packaging (bottles, caps, shrink wrap), design and purchase of retail counter displays and to upgrade our labels by having the printing out-sourced.


Other Ways You Can Help 
Please share our story on facebook, twitter, linkedin and sites like runnersworld.com, dailymile.com and slowtiwtch.com. Tell a friend, family member, athlete or weekend warrior.  Thank you in advance for considering Skin Care for Athletes.  So come on...get in the game!

story:
My Story

In 2003 my best friend’s mom, Bev Cushing, was diagnosed with breast cancer at age 47. Bev and my mom were friends long before they had 2 daughters (that’d be me, and my friend Dawn) that became best friends.  Those 2 friends were inseparable growing up, sharing clothes, toys - and moms. 

There was always room for one more at the Cushing household, that’s just the kind of lady Bev was. My "Other Mom" was not just my other mom - with an open heart and an open door, she was everyone's Other Mom.  In the spring of 2011, Bev passed away from her long battle with cancer. My album Pony Up is dedicated in her honor.

Every year the Canadian Breast Cancer Foundation puts on Canada’s largest single day, volunteer-led fundraising event dedicated to raising funds for breast cancer research, education and awareness.  This year, on September 30th, 2012 I am going to Calgary with my guitar in tow to cheer on my friend as I perform on the Main Stage as she does the Run For The Cure for her mom.  I am contributing to the run the best way I know how – through music. But I want to go beyond that, so I have started this campaign. With your help, we can raise money to donate to the Canadian Breast Cancer Foundation. 

For all of the daughters, sisters, mothers, grandmas, aunts. For the sons, husbands, grandfathers, uncles.  For best friends.  For “Other Moms”.

 

What I Need & What You Get

I am giving my music and other goodies away in exchange for your donations towards this cause. As all runners need a good teammate, I am joining Dawn’s team (though from the stage instead of in sneakers) and all proceeds raised in this campaign are for our team that is running for Bev.

If you've been thinking of buying one of my CDs, now is the perfect time to get one. If you want one for a friend, now is the time.  What’s more, is I am coming up with other unique offers exclusive to this campaign! If you want a private concert for you and your friends- this is the time!  Want me to finally cover that song you have asked me about? Now is the time.

Basically what I’m trying to say is…NOW IS THE TIME to get some Katie Rox goods!

 

The Impact

I don’t know that in our lifetime we will see a cure for Breast Cancer, but I know that in this lifetime– we can try. 

Music heals, and connects us all.  It is how you ended up on this page. I want to give you my music, and I want to help with this cause.  I know this campaign can reach an international base, and this is why I am asking for your help.  We come from all walks of life, and unfortunately so many of those walks have been affected by cancer.

We really can make a difference, so let’s do it!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign on to others, even if you yourself can’t donate – help me spread the word!  If you live in the Calgary area or any other area that has a Canadian Breast Cancer Run For The Cure this year on September 30th- I urge you to get involved - become a participant, a runner (or a walker) or even go to the finish line and cheer on the thousands of people who have committed their time and effort to helping find a cure.  And lastly, come see me at the Run for the Cure in Calgary!
