story:
At the beginning,we would like to clarify doubts ... WE ARE MANUFACTURERS...we are NOT RESELLERS!!!


Idea

The idea to start the business came from the knowledge that in the market there is no possibility of purchasing sexy toys, in this case dildo made ​​of Medical Grade Silicone Rubber by consumer preference. All offers on the Internet consist of orders already finished models, colors and sizes, which leads to the fact that users are denied when choosing.
We enable buyers to get exactly what they want.

Custom made

Once a customer chooses one of the dildo models proposed on the website, it still remains to choose the color, length and thickness, and confirm orders. To the desired address arrives exactly are these kind of toy is ordered. Each piece is done by hand and as such is unique.

Materials

The material used is Medical Grade Silicone Rubber highest quality that guarantees durability, endurance, and does not harm sensitive skin and does not cause allergic reactions.


Colors

To make the product as close as possible to customer, we tried to offer some color on our research, most users are looking for. We did not go too wide, that users will not be faced with the problem. We decided to start with 8 colors. The more colors, the harder it is to choose the right one.

Packaging

Your privacy is of the most importance to us and with our discreet packaging you can shop in confidence. With totally plain packaging, the only person getting excited by your delivery is you. What will it have written on it? Post office requires us to have a return address on your parcel. This will be shown as Ludicrum. 
On your credit or debit card statement it will also appear as Ludicrum. What your parcel looks like All orders are sent in plain packaging. There's absolutely no way of telling what's inside the parcel or who the sender is.

Create Your Own Fantasy

Special orders

Because of many combinations regard models, dimensions and colors we make every model when we receive Your order. We don't use mass production. If You want something special according to Your wishes feel free to contact us on SPECIAL ORDERS where You can explain to us Your wishes, needs and send us drawn sketch or photo of Your fantasy.

SPECIAL ORDER STEPS:

1.send us drawn sketch and/or photo and/or description of wishing model

2.we will contact You to make agree about all details and wishes

3.we will inform you about expected price

4.You will receive photos of 3d model ready for production

5.You have to confirm the order (or not)


Our timeline

SEPTEMBER 2014
Testing models done successful

OCTOBER 2014
Indiegogo campaign launch

NOVEMBER 2014
Finishing Indiegogo campaign

Producing models for Indiegogo contributors 

DECEMBER 2014
Shipping to Indiegogo contributors

Standard production & shipping begins

story:
Blind Wrestling Beauty and the Beast

Introducing Clinton (Blind Wrestling Beauty) and Marcus (The Beast)

We are on a mission to reach our goal to be at the Commonwealth Games in July 2014, in Glasgow Scotland. We wrestle out of Dilworth Wrestling Club, Auckland and proudly represent New Zealand in freestyle wrestling.

To get there we are asking for a little bit of your help and kindness. To qualify for the Games we have been selected to represent New Zealand at the upcoming Commonwealth Championships held in Johannesburg, South Africa on the 5th of December 2013. With a top 5 performance this will qualify us for a spot at the Glasgow Games. We are currently training 10 times a week to make this happen.

The trip will cost us just over $5000 each including travel and accommodation. Our goal is to raise $2000 to go towards our trip.

Clinton who is legally blind, has had an illustrious wrestling career and has been huge inspiration to many around the world. He is a role model and a true example that impossible is just a word, and that with belief, hard work, and a never say die attitude that anything is achievable.

Clinton's Achievements

·First blind wrestler to compete at the World Championships

.Oceania Champion 

·Commonwealth Championships Bronze Medalist

·Multiple New Zealand Champion

·Blind athlete of the year 2008

http://tvnz.co.nz/othersports-news/blind-kiwi-wrestler-defies-odds-5546991

http://www.radiosport.co.nz/player/ondemand/1579408902-clinton-davies--blind-wrestler-taking-on-the-wo

Clinton has also been a huge mentor, inspiration, and coach to Marcus and has helped Marcus advance with his wrestling.

Marcus fell into the sport of wrestling and has taken to it like a fish to water. He is the current New Zealand Heavyweight Champion. Last year Marcus competed in Morocco for the Olympic qualifiers where he won the bronze medal, falling one place short of qualifying for the Olympics. Marcus is as motivated as ever to make amends for last year's failure and compete at the Commonwealth Games.

Marcus’s Achievements

·  New Zealand Wrestling Champion 2013 (Heavyweight)

·  African Olympic Qualifying Championship bronze medalist 2012 (Heavyweight)

·  Oceania Championships silver medalist 2012 (Heavyweight)

·  New Zealand  Wrestling Champion 2011 (Heavyweight)

We greatly appreciate your help and generosity and we will be doing everything we can to do you all proud.

Please share with your friends.

story:
The Walk Across America

My enthusiasm for health and wellness began my freshman year at Indiana University in Bloomington, Indiana. My good friend and I started lifting weights at the campus gym and I absolutely fell in love with the iron. I was able to take total control of what I looked like and how I felt in my own skin and I could not get enough of that empowerment. That passion snowballed into a thriving career as a personal trainer and group fitness instructor and I have been doing that ever since. 

Over the past year I have been able to explore the different ways to fulfill wellness in my life and it has taken me to some pretty incredible places. I joined the University's club gymnastics team, I traveled to California and Nevada to learn about how to be a health coach with Herbalife, and I got to a record 55 personal training clients that have all been such incredible people and friends to me. I have felt so privileged to be the motivator and instructor in their lives and I want to take it to the next level. 

This next year of my life is going to be spent walking across 15 states of our great United States to find out more about what wellness means to others. I will inevitably meet people of all different walks of life and I want to find out what makes them want to be healthy, how they stay healthy, and what obstacles stand in their way of reaching their goals. I plan to take this knowledge to my endeavors in the future so I can impact more and more people. 

What Am I Looking to Raise?

I would love to raise $1000 for my trip across the country. It may not seem like much but to me it would mean everything. The money that I raise will go towards feeding my hungry face on the 3600+ mile journey, allow me to buy emergency equipment or things I had no thought of, and to keep me safe(r) in a hotel in the event of severe weather (I will be staying in a tent the entire trip). 

Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you so much for taking the time to read this page as well as my website if you checked that out. Even if you cannot contribute monetarily, there are still ways you can help out!

  • Post my link to any social media sites you may use
  • Have a looksie at the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Hi everyone!

My name is Mariana Coelho, and if you personally know me, you know of my love for my two cats: Francisco and Antonio.

Being very personal about my private life, this comes all a bit uneasy to me.

Francisco has been peeing blood for the past two months. I've been taking him to the Cat Practice, for all kinds of exams, in order to find out what's wrong with him. Dr. Dougherty has been taking really good care of my Francisco. However, so far, we have no answers. The good news is: we haven't found any big problems with his health yet, and I feel very blessed to still have my "baby" with me.

Next Monday, 12/22, Francisco will have a cystoscopy done. This procedure consists of putting a camera through his urethra to see what's wrong inside his bladder. He is getting this done at the Animal Medical Center. When I called to book his appointment, the bad news: it will cost me 3,000.00$. Apart from this procedure, Francisco has gone through blood exams, urine exams, x-Rays, ultrasound, and a new medication treatment called Acyst. Even though some of these procedures are pretty invasive, Francisco has been a "big boy" about it.

The vet bills have been incredibly overwhelming, and the cost of the cystoscopy was certainly more than I expected. All I want for Christmas this year, is for my Francisco to get better and to stop loosing blood.

If you can make a donation, or know of anyone who would be willing to help, please help us and spread the word. Any amount counts and will be greatly appreciated. You will certainly be making this cat mom very happy.


Ps: If, by any chance, we get more donations than we need, the money will go into Francisco's and Antonio's piggy bank!

However, so far, we have no answers. The good news is: we haven't found any big problems with his health yet, and I feel very blessed to still have my "baby" with me. Next Monday, 12/22, Francisco will have a cystoscopy done. This procedure consists of putting a camera through his urethra to see what's wrong inside his bladder. He is getting this done at the Animal Medical Center.  When I called to book his appointment, the bad news: it will cost me 3,000.00$. Apart from this procedure, Francisco has gone through blood exams, urine exams, x-Rays, ultrasound, and a new medication treatment called Acyst. Even though some of these procedures are pretty invasive, Francisco has been a "big boy" about it.The vet bills have been incredibly overwhelming, and the cost of the cystoscopy was certainly more than I expected. All I want for Christmas this year, is for my Francisco to get better and to stop loosing blood.If you can make a donation, or know of anyone who would be willing to help, please help us and spread the word. Any amount counts and will be greatly appreciated. You will certainly be making this cat mom very happy.Ps: If, by any chance, we get more donations than we need, the money will go into Francisco's and Antonio's piggy bank!

story:
Scan your body, through the device that you're reading this on.

  • Measure your whole body
  • Track your fitness over time
  • Find or create products perfect for you


YOU were meant to fit in this world. 


With instant 3D body scanning, you can track your health as never before, find and source clothes made for your body and have a virtual avatar that is exactly YOU.

How to digitise your body in seconds

1. Launch the application on your device (PC/Mac, tablet, or smartphone), and enable your camera. Fit yourself or friend into the outline; two photos are taken automatically, when in the right position. 


2. The photos are then uploaded to the cloud, and automatically processed by a sophisticated algorithm we've created, in just a few seconds. This process separates person and background, and finds the body underneath (reasonably thin) clothing.


3. A unique 3D model is then rebuilt of the person scanned. This is presented as a 'mannequin', or an avatar, along with over 100 body measurements.


So simple, yet so many uses!

  • Finally, find clothes that really fit. Plug your measurements into partners to discover the perfect garment for you!
  • Be part of a new wave of customised goods and services for everyone!
  • Track your body & workouts! Motivate & Measure real improvement!
  • 3D Print a mini version of yourself!

We're constructing so much more than a measurement widget - we're building a network. 

Imagine a simple, digital “passport” for your 3D body measurements. Tweet 

  • Plug it into any range of service providers that you choose (from e-commerce, custom-fit or health). 
  • Keep control over who can see what. 
  • Instantly customise your preferences, with just a click of a button.


We stand for revolutionary access to personalised goods and services

Questions:

Why do we still live in a world where people (many of them children) slave away to make cheap, disposable clothing? Much of it just ends up dumped, since by the time it's been made and shipped, fashion has already moved on.

Why is all of it made for some mystery standard person, who doesn't even exist, that doesn't match anyone very well?

Poikos believes in being able to quickly pinpoint your 'Goldilocks Garments', perfect for you.

Why is it that only the richest of people can afford to enjoy the comfort and privilege of personalised goods, such as clothing?

Poikos believes in a world where we can celebrate what makes us special. We believe in being able to actively choose those goods and services personal to us, at a price that we can all afford. 

Why try to fit into anyone else? Be yourself! Vive La Différence! 


We stand for revolutionary access to health

"And would some Power the small gift give us 
To see ourselves as others see us!..." -Robert Burns

Changes in the body can sneak up on us slowly before we realise. See if your body is heading in the right direction! 


Our founder was trying to lose weight, and was curious about her true progress. She began scanning herself week by week, and used Poikos tech to predict her future body (better or worse based on current trends). 

Being able to see potential futures objectively gave her lasting motivation to lose more than 15kg over 5 months. Simple awareness of our body leads to much better health outcomes. Tweet



Health professionals tell us we can go further. Body scanning can be applied to:

  • Epidemiology - Population studies
  • Diagnosis - Risk factors, deformity & posture detection, endocrine issues, metabolism
  • Diet & Weight - Helping to treat obesity and Diabetes Type II
  • Fitting - Supportive apparel, casts, prosthetics

We enable tracking of every aspect of the body shape and size, both internally (volume) and externally (measurements). This can enable a much more full and accurate estimation of health over time than crude rules-of-thumb such as BMI. 

Great health cannot be expressed in just one number. Tweet


Poikos GATs - Global Anthropometry Tools

GATs enable you to analyse and make sense of your data.

Share your information securely with those who help you to manage your health.

See how your body stats and health progress compare anonymously against the results of others in your area or demographic. Or, choose to go head-to-head with a friend or team!


We stand for creating a positive impact on humanity


We are determined to use this technology to help improve our world by supporting powerful new innovations.

We've been inspired to work towards improving the lives of 1 billion people over the next 10 years.

We're searching for partners in the social and charitable sphere who can apply our technology and expertise to help improve the world in collaboration with us.

Please get in touch with us if you share a similar vision of leaving a powerful legacy to the world. Nell's direct email: nell@poikos.com


Why we need your support today

After 2.5 years of tough development, our technologies for body measurement are almost ready. However, we now need to calibrate the system. We know that people expect accurate results, every time! 


We're inches away from the finish line. Our tech is proven. Final calibration on hundreds of early users takes both effort and money, because we need to do it fast but properly. 

We’ve invested more than $250k to get this far. We’ve won international awards for our unique approach to this age-old problem. Help nudge us over the finish line, and claim your place in history! YOU can make it happen!



Mmmm, perks!

To help to say 'thank you' for helping to get this out there, we have unique and awesome perks for you to choose from, from 3D avatars, to 3D-printed "mini-me's", to custom-fit clothing! Get yours, for as little as $25! Tweet

For our custom-clothing perks, we've chosen to collaborate with two garment manufacturers who particularly inspire us:

  • PretCastle is a zero-waste manufacturer, which uses unique, breakthrough technology (Direct Panel on Loom) to enable garments to be created thread-by-thread, rather than cutting a pattern out of a roll of material. This enables not only waste savings of 15%, but also creates advanced customisation capabilities, such as varying material elasticity in different parts of the garment.
  • Bombay Shirt Company offers men and women the ability to design their own unique custom-fitted shirt. Choose everything from material and cut, to the finer details such as buttons, cuffs, and monograms. All of it is selected by you, made perfectly for you, and sure to become a treasured friend.
Both PretCastle and Bombay Shirt Company are examples of the sorts of highly innovative, socially-minded ventures that our technology can support in partnership, and with whom we are proud to build an ecosystem.


What your money makes possible

Here's what your money will be spent on, in order of priority and impact:

  1. Product development and calibration, testing and rapid improvement
  2. Securing an ecosystem of partners to plug measurements into
  3. Building an even stronger team, focussed on developing what users want


We're honored to be featured by:

 "...Revolutionary patent‐pending technology for imaging and measuring the body in 3D"

 "...Partners within the health, bespoke wear, and e-commerce sectors, for a range of new capabilities across all industries."

 "...Advanced image-processing algorithms get to work to make this happen."

"...essentially, it's a 3D body imaging and measuring solution, with potential use cases for healthcare and e-commerce in particular."

 "Watson founded Poikos in 2010 with a few guiding principles: change the world through technology, lower medical costs, and create scalable infrastructure."

 "Nell started to monitor her own body over time. 'Because of that I lost 15 kilos in 5 months. It helped me getting to the perfect me.'"

"This is a really exciting company which started out in Birmingham Science Park and is now beginning to make a name for itself across Europe.” 

"...an extremely accurate model without requiring any additional hardware. In the longer term, the technology could be used in hospitals to accurately tailor drug dosages to a particular person."

 "We continue to be amazed at both the growth and strategy of Poikos, the Startupbootcamp Amsterdam Alumni led by Eleanor Watson."

 "First prize was claimed by the brilliant and visionary, Eleanor ‘Nell’ Watson, CEO of Poikos for the award-winning measurement app." 

"Poikos gained quite some awareness within the European investors’ community, inspired other Start-ups with its spirit, elated lots of fans and, again won the first prize. Congrats!"

Want to cover our story also? Why not get in touch with us, or grab our Press Pack!


Who are we?


Why this matters so much to us

Our founder Nell Watson's original concept was to help increase the adoption of advanced, low-waste manufacturing methods that can promote the up-skilling of textile workers. This could then lead to a revolution in clothing, mass-customisation. This means being able to produce personalised goods for prices approaching what you pay for standard issue.

The missing piece is the ability to easily get the specification of a person, so that goods can be easily custom-ordered. Solutions for this have so far had serious flaws:

  • Manual measurement is difficult to do alone, expensive to have done by an expert, and highly subjective.
  • Body scanners are very expensive, bulky, specialist equipment. 
  • The MS Kinect (which our technology is forward-compatible with) is impressive, but not built for this purpose, and is not very portable. 
  • Measurement by camera alone typically requires an inconvenient known 'marker', such as an A4 piece of paper or similar, as a reference for size. 

Despite these problems, body measurement offers crucial benefit to a whole range of sectors; e-Commerce, Custom-fit, Health, and beyond. 

We set out on a mission to solve the problems of access, ease of use, and complexity forever. This was our vision :

  • Unlimited measurements: virtually the entire body can be measured, in any way you can imagine. Surface, cross sections, volumes of the body.
  • Ease of use: No restrictions by where you can get yourself measured, and no need for any specialist markers. 
  • Access anywhere: Have your personal body data accessible wherever, or for whatever you might need it (commerce, health etc), but only ever be accessed with your permission.

After 2.5 years of continual development we're finally reaching our destination!


FAQ:

Can you really do this? Yes we can! We've spent over 2 years developing this technology from scratch. It works well, and when calibrated, is ready for commercial release. 

Is it safe? Yes, it only 'scans' using information from your camera, it's as safe as any picture. It's also very secure in terms of security and data (see below).

How many times can I use it? For all of the packages in the perks offered here: As many times and as often as you wish.

So it really doesn't require any special hardware? Indeed, the standard camera in your laptop, tablet or smartphone is enough (bear in mind, it requires specific poses taken by the system itself, you can't just import family photos!)

What accuracy can I expect? After calibration, we see an optimal accuracy of up to 8mm for circumferential measurements (around the body), and 3mm for linear measurements (such as limbs). This depends on having reasonable camera quality, etc.

How do you scale the measurements? The tech makes an estimate of height, and then asks the user to check it. This provides a scaling reference, and is MUCH more simple than using a fixed marker.

What are the limitations? Currently, the technology needs 

  • Good lighting (bright, ideally not strong shadows).
  • A reasonably un-cluttered background behind the user
  • The user to be wearing thin clothing (ideally gym clothing or underwear) 
  • A decent camera (minimum 2 megapixels) is also required

Over time, we aim to roll out new techniques to further compensate for all of these factors.

How many measurements do you take? We can take over 100 body measurements by default, and can create extra, custom measurements upon request. Hands and feet are the most difficult measurements to capture, in general.

What about Data and Privacy? Everything is highly secured. All data is sent via secure SSL connection, and image data is never saved to disk, instead being processed on-the-fly and then immediately deleted. Data is only ever read by machine.

In terms of Data Protection - your personal data belongs to you. We safeguard that data on your behalf, and port it to whichever application that YOU may explicitly choose to share your data with. 

What are the general terms of use?

We're offering a special experience for people who back us today. You'll have access to special versions of our software, and will be treated to ongoing first-access to new features. It is our intention to provide gratis, unlimited scanning access to our backers (fair use applies) for a minimum of 12 months, and likely for much longer thereafter.

What platforms will I be able to run it on? 

  • PC or Mac with a Web GL compatible browser (Flash or HTML5) with a 2+ MegaPixel camera.
  • iOS- iPhone 4s and above, iPad 2 and above.
  • Android (coming 2014)

Is a demo version available?

In times past we offered demos of our old prototypes to the public. However, we have major interface and technology upgrades coming in the near future. We feel that the old prototypes honestly no longer do justice in accurately illustrating the power of the forthcoming commercial version of the technology, so we've taken them down for the moment, to make them ready for general release.

Any other questions? Please either leave a comment, or get in touch with the team.

  • Nell's direct email: nell@poikos.com
  • LinkedIn: nl.linkedin.com/in/nellwatson


Developers and Partners

We made this from the ground-up for other innovators to take it and build upon it.

As a developer or entrepreneur, take our open-source interfaces and craft them into your app or website. Everything is perfectly customisable by you. Create new business models, speed your customer journey, and leap ahead of the competition! Check out our comprehensive API docs, and consider early commercial integration of our technology via the $5k perk.

_____________________________________

THANKS FOR YOUR INVALUABLE SUPPORT!

story:
Hello all,

My name is Luke Tungesvick and I am a born and raised Colorado native with a passion for the environment. Our forests have recently been plagued by both bugs and fire alike leaving many trees needing to be cleared. The wood is harvested but the top branches or crown is left behind as waste. This material, that was previously burnt off as useless, is actually where the tree stores all of the nutrients it's been collecting and we extract these nutrients using the tree's own static electricity to disintegrate the pine to powder. This is wonderful because it both solves what to do with this previously useless material, as well as helps to create some of the best soap in the market.

What I Need & What You Get

Essentially, I am requesting $10,000 to help progress the scale of the business (ramp up production) as well as investigate the use of a bio-degradable jar. It is currently a one man operation but we have much greater aspirations!

With every pledge you will get your own bottle(s) of Pinerite. You have to try it to believe it, but it sincerely is the best cleaner you will ever use. 

Even if the full goal is not reached we will still use the funds procured to further this project as far as possible, be it only scaling up, the new jar or vice-versa. Every penny will be stretched.

The Impact

This campaign's benefits speak for itself. We are using essentially no electricity, have no polluting runoff, and use a material previously considered wasteful, to create quite literally the best general cleaner ever. Moreover the pine crowns we need are literally everywhere in the Rocky Mountains and desperately need to be cleared out from the effects of the beetles and the blazes. I hate to sound like a broken record but it is WITH-OUT QUESTION THE BEST soap you will ever use. 

I really appreciate every single one of you even taking the time to learn about this new technology and the amazing products spawning from it. If you do not wish to pledge please just stay aware of new ethical products that are striving to better our planet!

Educate yourselves, Knowledge is power!

Thank you all,

Luke Tungesvick

story:
Hello, 

My name is Rhonda, and I am Denard's sister.   I have started this campaign because I feel I have a responsibility, as a big sister and the oldest, to help my mom take care of our family.  

Last Tuesday, Denard was unfortunately  the victim of a hit and run, and suffered severe injuries.  He was found at the side of the road, pretty much left for dead, until the police found him and he was transported to the hospital.  You can all imagine the state my mother Sharron Sheppard was in after she got that call from the hospital that she had better leave and fly out as fast as she could to be there with him.  Since then, he has been up and down, Almost every bone in his body is broken,  he's had a stroke, bleeding in his brain, been sedated, had a breathing tube, Woke up to ask for a case of pop, lol, but had a fever yesterday, and could possibly have pnemonia in his lungs right now.  Still waiting for an update.
So, you can all figure that the flight, food, medical expenses, and anything/everything else that is going to be needed, in this FIGHT that my little brother is going through, gets pretty expensive, I would really like to help my mom release one stress so she can be the best she can be and use all of her energy on helping him get better. 
I am so humbly from my heart, asking if you can please donate $20 to help her help my brother get through this.  As a mom of 2 boys, I can only help the way I know I can, and this is one way I know that they could use this.
I don't have any cool perks or reciepts or any gifts to offer if you donate....LOL The best I can do is offer to sing you a song, but the greatest perk out of this is knowing you are personally helping someone in their time of sickness.  I know DENARD WOULD DO THIS FOR ALL OF YOU, so I ask for you to please help him now.
Thank you so much for reading this, and God Bless You All!!!
xoxoxoxoxox
Love,
Rhonda Natasha Sheppard

story:
Fugitive Fitness

           My name is Chad Deaver, I am a Parkour Instructor and Personal Trainer, and I am opening the first parkour gym in Dallas to provide safe equipment and knowledgeable instruction to the North Texas area. I was certified through World Freerunning and Parkour Federation (WFPF) in January 2013, CrossFit in September 2011, and Cooper Institute in October 2013.

Fifteen years ago in high school, as captain of the Berkner wrestling team, I began to help others understand the way the body works and achieve their athletic and fitness goals. I went on to receive my Bachelor's from UTD, during which time I fell in love with both parkour and CrossFit. I began acquiring certifications and training experience on the side, so that one day I could realize my dream of opening the first parkour gym in Dallas!

Parkour is exploding in popularity across the globe as an exciting new discipline with positive core values and real life application. Since most people's exposure is through YouTube videos and not proper training, it has been misunderstood.  At it's heart, parkour is simply the discipline of training the body to traverse obstacles within the environment in the safest, most efficient way possible.

There are so many people throughout this region who are looking for a place to safely learn and train in parkour. Cities like Austin, Houston, and San Antonio all have parkour gyms. Current traceurs need a place to train other than gymnastics facilities which hold "open gym" once a week, grant limited access to equipment, and provide an unrealistically padded/springy environment. Children and adults inspired by shows like American Ninja Warrior are constantly posting on social media sites trying to locate a facility that teaches parkour classes. Everyone from children to grandparents can benefit from the improved coordination, balance, agility, and strength that parkour training yields. Our facility will provide all these people with a safe place to train, especially during extreme and inclement weather.  Fugitive Fitness will allow for people of lower skill or fitness level to build up to the bigger moves that they see online, rather than having to go outside and face the potential dangers. We will also provide some of the most effective strength and conditioning coaching available to ensure the safety and success of our students. The combination of skill and technique with strength and conditioning will provide practitioners of any age a functional fitness with benefits throughout their lives. 

We will definitely be opening very soon, but we are still about $8000 short of our start-up goal. Here is your chance to be a part of something huge in the DFW community. Donations can get you everything from T-shirts and bandanas to free memberships and memorial plaques. Please contribute whatever you can, but most importantly spread the word! We need everyone in Dallas to know who we are, where we are, and what we are doing for parkour and fitness in the North Texas area. Please help however you can and we'll be training together soon!

Facebook Page:

https://www.facebook.com/fugitivefitness

YouTube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TZ_3JznyJhI

story:
Short Summary

Korinne is a 26 year old transsexual model from Milwaukee, Wi. 

"Hey everyone a little about myself, I've been modeling for about a year now and absolutely love it. It's been hard getting work being pre-op but I've kept my nose to the grinding stone, made an effort to put my best foot forward, and have started to grind out a small place for myself. 

That said it's truly an uphill battle doing this job being pre-operative. I'll get messages constantly from photographers and agents talking me up only to avoid me like the plague when I inform them of my trans status. SRS would mean to me a real opportunity to do what I love without all the hate and discrimination. 

I've been working towards this goal all my life in some way or another. I hate to ask anyone for help but truth is, I really could use some.

Thank you all so much,

-Korinne"


Kelly is a 23 year old transsexual performer from Kansas City, Mo.

"Hi loves! As long as I can remember, full transition has been my first priority in everything I do. All jobs I've taken, and all the moves I've made have been in being able to reach the end goal of SRS. 

In the past year I've gone to great lengths in putting myself out there, in public forum, and even moved half-way across the country in hopes of earning more wages for this goal. I had hoped my self-sacrifice would pay off, but, it unfortunately hasn't reached me any closer to my goal.

I'm reaching out to you, the supporters of everything I do in hopes of providing you perks for you generous contributions to helping me finally be at peace with myself<3"



After befriending one another we en-devoured to move to Los Angeles, Ca in hopes of making enough money for Gender Confirmation Surgery. 

Join us on our fight to this lofty goal. It is a significant amount of money and we ask you all for help. Every Donation helps and we'll reward you with perks! We both win!

What We Need

The $41,000 includes:

$19,500 x 2 for Vaginoplasty

http://www.drchristinemcginn.com/services/srs/vaginoplasty.php

The debate between GCR Surgeons was a long and hard process. One has to Take into account many different factors for the surgery let alone the factors for travel to and from, recovery, and making sure the videographer and all their tools get there on time as well.

Certain surgeons lost favor when we researched them and found they'd run into complications, their end results looked lack luster, or the patient accounts of a positive nature. I want to remind you all that vaginoplasty is a major surgery involving one's major sexual organs. 

Being cheap and risking it on ill equipped or lack luster surgeons can mean ending up with a colostomy bag for the rest of your life and a Barbie doll genital region. What stability could a girl suffering from gender disphoria find then if they lack any genitalia at all? Risks of rectal breaches, infection, and a host of gruesome after affects abound all responsible transitioners must at some point take into account prior to deciding on surgery and surgeon.

There is a long recovery period were one will have trouble doing day to day things from 2-3 weeks to a month in a half depending on how surgery goes and how their unique body reacts. I'd like to note we are not asking for aid in travel expenses, work time lost due to recover, or the amount more it'll cost once taxes have been added onto the figures.

The decision to go with Dr. Mcginn over anyone else had to do with a sound tract record, her unique view point being a post operative transsexual woman herself, her end result images and discussions we've had with real people who've gone to her for this particular operation. She is the next cheapest elite surgeon after Dr. Suporn and she is only a few states away vs the entire Pacific Ocean.

The $2,000 over is taking into account the 4% service fee of Indiegogo


Sharing Timelines

The following is a a link to Korinne's full timeline Korinne's Living Timeline



The Following is a timeline from Kelly Klaymour's transition process:

story:
When I first met Jess it was in passing. She was a University student studying broadcasting who had an interest in women’s MMA, and was doing a couple interviews for a school project. And that was that.  And then, about a year ago, she stepped on onto the mats herself...

From day one, she was as serious about the sport as anyone I have ever seen. For the next year she came virtually every single day, six days a week, every week. That alone is impressive, but what really stood out was how she trains: fully committed, never half-assed, and always fully present. Good days, bad days, exciting days, tired days, whatever, she showed up.

What astounds me the most is that she is 22 years old. Jess possesses a rare character and level of maturity seldom seen, one which any woman of any age can aspire to.

All of her training partners, friends, and family have watched in amazement as she has become a well-rounded and skilled martial artist, extremely dangerous fighter, and even a coach in her own right. All of this is an amount of time that seems utterly impossible.

As her coach, she has made me beyond proud, because she has shown everyone around her a deeper truth to the martial arts, in that to be a warrior is less of what you can do, but more of what you have become.

To show appreciation for her just before she goes to battle in the cage for the first time, I would invite you to do two things with me.

First, if you are one of her training partners, a friend by her side, a family member behind her, or you just want to show your support and stand with her, please share this. Help me let the world know how much all of her hard work has been noticed.

Second, help me bring her to Thailand for a month of training at the world class Tiger Muay Thai and MMA. To make this possible, I have set up crowd funding for her.

Hopefully together we can help her reach just a bit further towards her true potential and achieve a dream.

To finish, I just wanted to say to Jess personally that all of your incredible dedication has been witnessed, all of your unstoppable ferociousness has been admired, and your sheer force of will has impressed.

You have truly earned your newly minted moniker, not today, but every day since you first had the bravery to step on the mats; may the future bring all that it has to Jess “Valhalla” Elverum!

- Dan Miller - Coach, Emergent Martial Arts

story:
Gary Volk

Gary has been my friend since kindergarten. He was one of the most talented, athletic, handsome, and smartest people I have ever known. He wanted to be a doctor and was just a great person. Sadly, in high school he had a tragic motorcycle accident which left him with a metal plate in his head and partial paralysis on one side. It did not stop him, he was married and held a job for 40 years at the hospital. Unfortunately, last year his wife left him and when his car broke down he was unable to get to work and they fired him. He lost his home and ended up on the street. He tries each day to get work, but without a place to live, clothes, a car and the things we take for granted it becomes impossible to get a job. 
If I had the personal resources to help him I would, but I dont. If he had family to help, they would. Therefore, I am reaching out to the global community to help. The goal is to raise enough money to help Gary get an apartment, get some clothes, and get a used car. With a little runway, Gary will find a job and quickly become self-supporting. The longer he is homeless at his age the more likely something bad will happen, and this is unacceptable. Gary has had a tough stretch, but with some financial aid and the support from a few of his friends, we can save Gary and help him get his life back.
Please help, any donation will make a huge difference.  The law of doing the right thing compels me help Gary as I cannot sit back and do nothing. Join me and let's save a life.

Join me and let's save a life.

story:
Your Donation Can Help Save a Baby

And we have special donor perks donated by Walt Disney World

Thanks to the generosity of Walt Disney World, donors at different levels can receive premiums of a "Furry Friends" collectible or a My First Disney Bear.


In 1982, our family founded a national 501 (c) (3) nonprofit organization called Birth Defect Research for Children (BDRC). Over the past 32 years, we have helped thousands of families with birth defect information, support & resource referrals and parent matching services that connect families who have children with similar birth defects.



We also provide the latest information on how to have a healthier baby through our Healthy Baby Resource.


BDRC’s most important project, however, is the National Birth Defect Registry, a powerful tool to investigate the causes of birth defects.  The registry was developed through a collaboration of prominent scientists and has been the first to find links between several patterns of birth defects and environmental exposures.


 The National Birth Defect Registry is funded entirely by the public through individual donations and grants. 

The registry is a rapid and inexpensive early warning system that can identify patterns of birth defects (both structural and functional) connected to similar exposures.

Because we don't use test animals to discover links between birth defects and exposures, the National Birth Defect Registry was given the Research Innovation Award from Physician’s Committee for Responsible Medicine. 

BDRC was also awarded the Humane Charity Seal of Approval.


According to Harold Zenick, Ph.D., Director of the Office of Research and Development of the EPA, “Your birth defect registry is the type of effort needed to make linkages between environmental exposures and birth defects.”

For example, we helped the community of Dickson, Tennessee identify an 1100% increase in cleft palate in their community over a three-year period.  This increase was linked to a solvent leaking into their water supply from an old landfill.



The registry also found the first links between service in the first Gulf War and increases in a rare birth defect of the head and face.  A government study later found a tripling of this same birth defect.

And registry research found a pattern of functional disabilities in the children of Vietnam veterans which include increased in learning & attention disorders, immune and endocrine disorders. 


Other examples of registry research can be found on this page. 

There has never been a greater need for the National Birth Defect Registry. A recent report has revealed that disabilities in the U.S. rose 16% in children younger than 17 between 2001-2011. Cases related to neurodevelopmental conditions such as attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, learning disabilities or emotional problems increased by 21%.

The registry has started to evaluate neurobehaviorial conditions like Autistic Spectrum Disorder.

story:
The Nashville Rollergirls All Stars are going to Playoffs!

It's that time again... the Nashville Rollergirls All Stars are headed to Division 1 WFTDA Playoffs in Evansville, Indiana on September 19, and we need your help to finish out the season successfully! 

2014 has been a banner season for the All Stars. After ending the 2013 season ranked #39, we scheduled a demanding 2014 season with more travel and home games than ever to provide our young All Star team with the experience needed to compete at the highest levels. It's paid off! We've steadily climbed the rankings every month this year, and we're going to playoffs this year ranked #31 in the world. 

  • The Nashville Rollergirls All Stars have played 17 games since February 2014
  • We've been rising in the WFTDA worldwide rankings from 2013 #39 to current #31
  • We've faced tough competition from teams ranked high above us including Toronto (#23), Ohio (#20) and Minnesota (#5)
  • 2014 has included travel to Columbus OH, Cincinnati OH, Bloomington IN, Atlanta GA, Columbia SC, Ft. Lauderdale FL and soon, Evansville IN for playoffs

Roller Derby is EXPENSIVE.

The 2014 season has been taxing on the wallets of our All Stars. Earlier in the year, our travel to Ft. Lauderdale, FL cost more than $600 per skater. This weekend, we're traveling to Atlanta for a playoffs-prep scrimmage with the #13 Atlanta Rollergirls. 2014 marks the first season in the history of NRG that all 20 All Star team members have competed on a game roster, which means we're more competitive than ever - But it also means that we have more skaters regularly traveling and bouting than ever!

Did you know...? 

  • A set of Nashville Rollergirls jerseys costs each skater $100, and they have to be replaced every year or two.
  • A good set of knee pads costs $100, and knee pads should be replaced every 6-12 months for maximum protection! Add $30 for elbow pads, $20 for wrist guards, $40 for a shiny black team helmet, $20 for toe stops (replaced every few months) and a whopping $500 or more for a solid pair of skates. The cost of roller derby gear is staggering!
  • 2014 travel costs will exceed $1,000 per skater this year, and that doesn't include the unpaid time off many skaters have to take from work. Don't forget about our coaches, officials and announcers who travel with us too! Travel costs for the league this year will top $20,000 and it comes straight out of our pockets. 

Here's where YOU come in: 

The Nashville Rollergirls have been so fortunate to partner with the world-renowned locals at Anderson Design Group to become part of their iconic Spirit of Nashville collection. The original artwork they created for our poster is featured alongside local legends like the Ryman Auditorium, Cheekwood, the Bluebird Cafe, Centennial Park and more.

These posters are beautiful. The vibrant original artwork is printed on high quality, thick poster paper and the posters have been stored flat to prevent dings, creases and tears. Each poster is hand-numbered out of 100, and the first few buyers will receive copies signed by the illustrator! 

  • For $40, you can own one of the first 100 prints of the Nashville Rollergirls Spirit of Nashville poster. 
  • For $50, you can have your poster signed by one Nashville Rollergirl of your choice.
  • For $100, you can have your poster signed by the entire 2014 All Star team!

To save on packaging and shipping costs, we'll offer local pickup at our September 14 game at the state fair, as well as a few other TBD local Nashville pickup dates over the next month or two. 

If you don't live in Nashville but still want to support us, we're happy to ship to you! Please select the support level that includes a small fee to cover the cost of poster tubes and shipping. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you'd like to make a donation without receiving a poster, please email fundraising@nashvillerollergirls.com and we'll make sure you get a receipt for tax write-off. 

Help us get the word out! Share this campaign on your social media profiles to help us raise the most money possible in a short amount of time. 

And most of all... come to a game! A big part of keeping the Nashville Rollergirls afloat financially is ticket sales. We have a lot of fixed costs going into game day, so the more tickets we sell, the more money we can make! The money we make on game day helps us pay rent at our practice space, place advertising, print posters, bring in outside trainers to help us improve our skills and more.
story_txt:
The Nashville Rollergirls All Stars are going to Playoffs! It's that time again... the Nashville Rollergirls All Stars are headed to Division 1 WFTDA Playoffs in Evansville, Indiana on September 19, and we need your help to finish out the season successfully! 
2014 has been a banner season for the All Stars. After ending the 2013 season ranked #39, we scheduled a demanding 2014 season with more travel and home games than ever to provide our young All Star team with the experience needed to compete at the highest levels. It's paid off! We've steadily climbed the rankings every month this year, and we're going to playoffs this year ranked #31 in the world.  
The Nashville Rollergirls All Stars have played 17 games since February 2014 We've been rising in the WFTDA worldwide rankings from 2013 #39 to current #31
We've faced tough competition from teams ranked high above us including Toronto (#23), Ohio (#20) and Minnesota (#5) 2014 has included travel to Columbus OH, Cincinnati OH, Bloomington IN, Atlanta GA, Columbia SC, Ft. Lauderdale FL and soon, Evansville IN for playoffs 
Roller Derby is EXPENSIVE.
 The 2014 season has been taxing on the wallets of our All Stars. Earlier in the year, our travel to Ft. Lauderdale, FL cost more than $600 per skater. This weekend, we're traveling to Atlanta for a playoffs-prep scrimmage with the #13 Atlanta Rollergirls. 2014 marks the first season in the history of NRG that all 20 All Star team members have competed on a game roster, which means we're more competitive than ever - But it also means that we have more skaters regularly traveling and bouting than ever!
Did you know...?  
A set of Nashville Rollergirls jerseys costs each skater $100, and they have to be replaced every year or two. A good set of knee pads costs $100, and knee pads should be replaced every 6-12 months for maximum protection! Add $30 for elbow pads, $20 for wrist guards, $40 for a shiny black team helmet, $20 for toe stops (replaced every few months) and a whopping $500 or more for a solid pair of skates. The cost of roller derby gear is staggering! 2014 travel costs will exceed $1,000 per skater this year, and that doesn't include the unpaid time off many skaters have to take from work. Don't forget about our coaches, officials and announcers who travel with us too! Travel costs for the league this year will top $20,000 and it comes straight out of our pockets.  
  Here's where YOU come in: 
The Nashville Rollergirls have been so fortunate to partner with the world-renowned locals at Anderson Design Group to become part of their iconic Spirit of Nashville collection. The original artwork they created for our poster is featured alongside local legends like the Ryman Auditorium, Cheekwood, the Bluebird Cafe, Centennial Park and more.

These posters are beautiful. The vibrant original artwork is printed on high quality, thick poster paper and the posters have been stored flat to prevent dings, creases and tears. Each poster is hand-numbered out of 100, and the first few buyers will receive copies signed by the illustrator! 
 
For $40, you can own one of the first 100 prints of the Nashville Rollergirls Spirit of Nashville poster.  For $50, you can have your poster signed by one Nashville Rollergirl of your choice. For $100, you can have your poster signed by the entire 2014 All Star team!


To save on packaging and shipping costs, we'll offer local pickup at our September 14 game at the state fair, as well as a few other TBD local Nashville pickup dates over the next month or two. 

If you don't live in Nashville but still want to support us, we're happy to ship to you! Please select the support level that includes a small fee to cover the cost of poster tubes and shipping. 

  
Other Ways You Can Help

 If you'd like to make a donation without receiving a poster, please email fundraising@nashvillerollergirls.com and we'll make sure you get a receipt for tax write-off. 
Help us get the word out! Share this campaign on your social media profiles to help us raise the most money possible in a short amount of time. 
And most of all... come to a game! A big part of keeping the Nashville Rollergirls afloat financially is ticket sales. We have a lot of fixed costs going into game day, so the more tickets we sell, the more money we can make! The money we make on game day helps us pay rent at our practice space, place advertising, print posters, bring in outside trainers to help us improve our skills and more.

story:
One Daughters Journey

My name is Jayne, my husband Bill and I have a beautiful daugher, Gena who will turn 30 in March and is the most amazing person.  Gena was born with congenital heart defects and has had health issues and surgeries throughout her life.  Gena's heart valves both quit working three years ago and they had to be replaced, she now has two tissue valves.  It was a surgery she would have not made it through were it not for her strength.  She was in the ICU for 66 days and was the sickest person at the Hospital for several weeks.  A flap from her belly was used to close her chest as they were unable to close her sternum. 

I started writing her story and my Mother wanted to put it in her blog, so it was finished by her and here are the links to read and see a few pictures.

One Daughters Journey Part 1:

http://rilly-momsnotepad.blogspot.com/2012/09/one-daughters-journey-part-i.html

One Daughters Journey Part 2:

http://rilly-momsnotepad.blogspot.com/2012/10/one-daughters-journey-iithe-wedding.html

One Daughters Journey Three Years Later:

http://rilly-momsnotepad.blogspot.com/2013/02/a-daughters-journeythree-years-later.html

 Gena lost the muscle and feeling in her left leg from a clot in her foot while sedated and chest still open in the ICU.  They were unable to give her anything to break up the clot for fear it would travel toher heart.  Much dead tissue was removed after they were able to close her chest with a flap from her belly.  She is undergoing physical therapy to get the use of her left leg better so it's not causing the right leg to overwork.  She had surgery to have the foot held up permanently instead of having her toes pointed down as they were. 

Gena has always been independent so not working has been an adjustment for her.  She volunteers at a kitty rescue in Charlotte near her home and works on her legs with her husband at night.  She wants to be able to stand for long periods without pain. 

Her and her husband are involved in a PT Cruiser Car Club and Gena's is decorated like Hello Kitty. There goal is to move to Colorado and eventually start a family.  If Gena isn't able to carry a baby full term, adopt or have a gestational carrier.  They will make wonderful parents some day.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean they can’t help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
UPDATE: Placebo Effect has been featured on dozens of blogs & media outlets around the world. Here's just a small sampling of the excitement:  

From Huffington Post: "When Daniel took me through a trial of the app, I instantly felt calmer and more centered, even though we were sitting in a busy café. It gave me hope."

From Fast Company: "The point is to replicate what’s important about the placebo effect, which isn’t the pill itself, but the experience."

From Mashable: "The whole idea is to create a comfortable "happy place" to achieve the proper effect."

From AOL: "It gives you a personalized placebo without actually handing you a pill or anything physical!"

From Geekwire: "One real benefit of the app is its mobility — you don’t need to go to a doctor’s office to get the placebo effect."

From The Verge: "If placebos could be effectively prescribed without the need to lie to patients, it would be revolutionary. Placebos are cheaper and safer than many treatments."

From HuffPostTV: "This app lets you create personalized placebo effects to enhance your life."

Check Out A Video Of Our Placebo App Prototype Here! 

REMEMBER: Any reward level you choose, will also include additional offerings from any levels below it! 

 

App Features and Benefits 

1. Choose Your Placebo Effect

You - not some doctor or researcher - get to choose your placebo effect. Do you want more health, love, joy... something else? Do you want to stop smoking, decrease stress after work, or support your children in calming down before class? You choose!

2. Use Anytime, Anywhere

You can take a placebo anytime anywhere. You are limited only by where you take your smartphone. 

3. Schedule Reminders

You can schedule your app to remind you when to take your desired placebo - once, twice, or however many times a day you need. 

4. Personalize Your Placebo

Once you've chosen your placebo effect, you get to personalize your placebo ritual by choosing who is the best person to give you a placebo, what you want your placebo to be, and where you want to take it.

5. Customize Your Experience

Whether you want to receive a placebo magic wand from Gandolf in the dark of the night while he says abra cadabra, or you want to receive a placebo from your mother in your childhood home while she sings her favorite song, you can use your mobile phone to create the perfect placebo experience for you!

6. Track Your Progress

You can rate your experience before and after you take your placebo. These ratings will help you to judge your own performance, and will also give us data that can allow us to provide feedback that can help you enhance your placebo ritual. 

7. Real-time Placebo Optimization 

The Placebo App is a living app. It gets better as it goes - based on your feedback, and on the feedback of others. 

8. Change Your Life

You have everything you need to create a placebo experience that is directly personalized to your needs, and thus is optimized to create the kind of growth, healing, or change you wish to see in your life. 

 

Summary of Placebo Effect Campaign

  • Placebo Effect - the world's most trafficked online placebo resource - is building the world's first mobile placebo application, one that takes the placebo effect out of the lab and brings it into people’s lives so you and others around the world can experience more love, joy, inspiration, or whatever you feel you need in your lives. 

  • We've built a prototype of the app (Watch us demo the Placebo App), and now we need your help to fund building a production version that can scale to support you and millions of people around the world.
  • We are a veteran design an engineering team that has built award-winning apps that have scaled to millions of users, and we have an advisory team that can support our twinkle-eyed placebo vision, as they are institute and universitydirectors, physicians, scientists, consciousness researchers, nonprofit and business executives, and the former head of IT of the Gates Foundation. 

 

 

About Placebo Effect

  • Placebo Effect was created in December of 2011 by Daniel Jacobs with one simple directive: to educate people all over the world about the placebo effect, and to inspire people to learn to use it to heal, grow, and evolve in their lives!

  • Placebo Effect, our website (pictured below) is now the world’s most trafficked online placebo effect resource. We also have created a methodology for using the placebo effect in people’s lives that has been practiced around the world.

  • We have developed a prototype placebo app that is based on our Placebo Methodology, and on all existing placebo effect research. Now its time to turn our Placebo App prototype into Placebo App that can change the lives of millions of people around the world.

 

Why the Placebo App

  • Placebo effects happen when peoples' belief systems - both conscious and unconscious - inspire positive change. The results, oftentimes, can be staggering: tumors can heal, anxiety can go away, academic performance can increase... all because someone took a placebo.

  • Different people have different conscious and unconscious beliefs in different circumstances. The same experience could provide one person with a strong placebo effect, and create no placebo effect for another person.

  • Until now there has been no way to provide people with a personalized placebo effect that is aligned with their own experiences - despite the demonstrable effectiveness of placebos across medical studies. We decided to change that!

  • Most of us haven't even begun to tap our own healing, growing, and performance potential - because we've been taught that pills, people, or procedures know better about what we need than we do. The Placebo App shows us how powerful we really are!

 

How You Can Help

1. Make A Pledge

Make a pledge by clicking the PLEDGE button above, and choose whatever reward fits you. Feel the magnitude of your pledge. You aren't just contributing to something that can be of benefit to you; you are also supporting people all over the world in creating meaningful change in their lives. 

2. Share Our Story

Share our IndieGogo Campaign via email, Facebook, Twitter, phone calls, text messages and through old fashioned conversations. Placebo Effect will continue to come to life because a community wanted and created its emergence!

3. Leave Your Mark 

At the end of the campaign you’ll be able to tell us what kind of placebo effect you want to create in your life or in the world. Please do this! We want to use our community feedback as an important pointer as we build the production version of the app!

 

 

How Funds will be Spent

  • All funds will be spent on the development of the Placebo App, and on costs surrounding that development. Included in those costs are personnel costs, travel costs, hosting and design costs. 
  • $20,000 gets us a mobile web app, $40,000 raised gets is an iPhone app, and $60,000 raised gets us an Android app. 
  • Typically a project of this magnitude would be well into six-figure range. Due to strategic partnerships and the team’s experience level, we will be able to make placebo magic with much less.
  • Funds above $50,000 will be spent on Stage II development, which includes further optimizing the application based on community feedback, readying the app for important clinical trial testing, and sharing the app with millions of people around the world.

story:
Short Summary

Caelan was injured in a bicycle accident on September 23, sustaining a sever brain injury.  He also lost his mother to pancreatic cancer in May this year, so the family has faced a good bit of difficulty.  Caelan has been doing really well in rehab for the injury, and we hope to have him home in November.  His Dad (ME!) would like to be home during the home rehab stages, but we do not have the funds available to do that.

What We Need

Given the other stresses on the family this year, I would dearly love to be able to be home for Caelan's transition from the hospital to normal life.  He will likely need extensive outpatient therapy sessions once he is released, and I want to be available for that.  I can take the family leave (FMLA) time off, but still need to pay bills.  The goal is to have enough gifts to cover at least 2 months of expenses.

The Impact

Caelan is (if I may be allowed to brag) an exceptional boy, and has already faced enough challenges.  Funding this campaign would allow for our family to better meet his needs as he comes home and prepares for the remaining steps in his recuperation.  Anything over our basic monthly bills will be put into a scholarship fund for Caelan.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't give, let others know about Caelan, and please pray for his continued recovery.

story:
Welcome to Advanced Eco Filtration and our Indiegogo project where our dream is to make your home and office one of the best places on earth to breathe. Now you may be wondering why are we so passionate about your lungs and the air you inhale?Simply because your lungs are one of the most important organs in your body and recent scientific studies suggest that “indoor air-pollution” is a major cause of discomfort and even illness.

Reinventing The Air Filter 

While many of us focus on the foods we eat and the beverages we drink most times we ignore the air we breathe. At Advanced Eco Filtration we know there is a tremendous difference between air and quality air, which is why we take the air your inhale seriously.  

We utilize multi-layer filtration technology with PollenTEC filter media.

A revolutionary fabric, PollenTEC is a filter for your entire home allowing fresh air to flow indoors while filtering up to 100% of pollens and other harmful microscopic particals. PollenTEC has been hospital clean room tested certified by the European Center for Allergy Research Foundation.

How is our eco air filter different

Eco Air filters are made with PollenTEC material that has been tested and certified in a hospital setting for its effectiveness in capturing up to 100% of airborne pollen spores.

 

 

 

In 2009 we tested our first prototype  at an independent lab.

The results were better than we expected and much better than any other washable filter you could find on the market.

 

The new 1” Eco Air Filter is the finest washable, reusable air filter on the market. The new Eco Air Filter is a 1”  width air filter. The Eco Air filters are made with one layer of 1 ” Dense Poly-Flo and two layers of PollenTEC. Our Eco filters provide unsurpassed performance and durability.

 

Throw in the added benefit of being completely recyclable and we knew we had a hit, and one that will also pay for itself in the first year. Within the next four years, it is basically a free filter.

 

In 2012 we launched a unique service model for our commercial market. It is a complete reuse cycle where we deliver, change out and then clean our filters for the next use. It`s less expensive and reduces the buildings carbon foot-print.

 

Another exciting part of our mission and filter service is giving back to the community. We have partnered with STARS a community based rehabilitation center that facilitates training   for the handicapped to become independent by teaching them skills to work with local companies.

  

 

Think about this:

We worry about disposing water bottles improperly but when it comes to air filters many times the size and weight of a water bottle, we ignore the long- term effects on our planet. 

Homes, buildings, schools, hospitals all use some type of air filter.100% of all disposable filters end up in our country`s landfills. That’s well over a billion filters into our landfills every year.

 

Pledges / Pricing

Pledge $10.00 You receive the happy tulip certificate of appreciation personally signed by AEF founder Paul Honnen

 

 

$10.00 Pledge receives the Happy Tulip certificate of appreciation personally signed by the founder of AEF Paul Honnen

$15.00 Pledge Eco Filter or PollenTEC screening material you receive a $20 coupon to use at www.pollentec.com

$40 Pledge receives 1 Eco Air filter

$65 Pledge receives 2 - Pack 1” Eco Air filters

$120 Pledge receives the big house pack of 4 -1” Eco Air filters

$1,000 Pledge receives a $1200 coupon towards the purchase of our 1” or 2” commercial office building package with filter service.

$10,000 Pledge receives a $11,000 coupon towards the purchase of our 1” or 2” commercial office building package with filter service.

 

Why Indiegogo?

We've been working on our Eco air filters for over three years. We're very proud of the work we've done so far, but we need one more push so that we are able to run volume production.

Through Indiegogo you're ORDERING our Eco air filter. With your support, we will put our Eco air filters into homes and buildings nationwide and start helping millions of people and businesses save money, help our planet and create jobs for the handicapped. While we're able to produce filters on a small  limited scale, your contribution will help fund:

  •   Equipment for manufacturing and production.

  •   Bulk materials purchase

  •   Larger  facility

 

On behalf of your lungs, On behalf of our Environment, On behalf of the team at AEF and our partners at STARS, I want to personally thank you for taking the time to learn about our Indiegogo campaign and making our goal a reality.

At AEF we are working hard to make your home and office one of the best places on earth to breathe.

 

 

Comments, Questions, Partnerships?

Please check out our FAQ section below , or email us:

Email: paulh@advecofiltration.com

 or you can call us directly at 623-888-6304

And a final THANK YOU to our current partners & contributors!

 

Crowd Funding FAQ`S

Q` What is the MERV rating of the Eco Air filters?

A` Eco Air filters have a MERV rating of 7 and 8.

Q ` What does a MERV rating mean?

A` MERV, or Minimum Efficiency Reporting Value, is a numerical value given to filters in order to identify its filtering abilities.  MERV values vary from 1 to 16.  The higher the MERV value is the value the more efficient the filter will be in trapping airborne particles.  Another consideration is air flow through your HVAC system.  Leaving a dirty air filter in place or using a filter that is too restrictive may result in low airflow and possibly cause the system to malfunction.

Q` Are you planning on offering your filters to distributors?

A` Yes we are intending to explore our options in the future.

Q` Will you ship internationally?

A` Yes we do pledges are only redeemable through our website w ww.pollentec.com.

Q` Is the price the same on any size filter?

A` YES

Q` Do you offer a 2- inch width filter?

A` Yes AEF offers 1 and 2-inch filters, with or with an internal frame, depending on application. Larger widths can be quoted depending on application.

Q` How long can I expect the filters to last?

A` Our Eco Air Filter`s will last at least 5 years and most likely longer or 30 washing with proper care and cleaning

Q` How do I clean my Eco air filter?

A` Recommended cleaning is with a garden hose, with mild detergent and lots of water. A more convenient method is to use you dish washer, regular wash cycle (no heat cycle), and a mild detergent.  Dry by hanging in warm dry area or in front load Dryer on delicate cycle for no more than 10 minutes.

Q` How often should or can I clean my Eco air filter?

A` Eco air filters should be changed whenever they get dirty, remember you don’t have to by a new filter. Just wash and replace your Eco filter.  AEF does recommend cleaning ever 2 to 3 months depending on the area you live.  We recommend having a set of two filters.  This allows you to immediately install a clean Eco filter and cleaning the dirty filter at your convenience.                 

Q` What is your warranty on the Eco filters?

A`  AEF will repair or replace you filter for 3 years, from date of purchase, due to failure of material and/or construction, under normal usage.

Q` I own several apartment buildings and need much larger quantities?

A` AEF will quote you for the entire project. We offer addition service to our commercial customers. AEF will pick up and clean your filters and even remove dirty and replace with clean filters. Please contact us for details.

Q` Who should I contact about buying your filters and using your filter service with our commercial properties?

A` All commercial prospects should contact our corporate office:

Telephone 480-650- 3460

Email: paulh@advecofiltration.com

Web Site: www.advecofiltration.com

 

Who we are

AEF is out to change the multi-billion dollar air filtration industry. We produce and offer sustainable, energy-efficient filtration products for healthier indoor environments. We are committed to the Environment where an alternative choice of air quality products and services are ultimately better for the planet. The result is a wise investment for our customers and a solid strategy for AEF as a company.

 

About our Eco Air Filters

ECO AIR FILTER

The new Eco Air Filter is the finest washable, reusable air filter on the market. The Eco Air filters are made with PollenTEC material that has been tested and certified in a hospital setting for its effectiveness in capturing up to 100% of airborne pollen spores. The new Eco Air Filter is a 1” width air filter. The 1” Eco Air filters are made with one layer of 1” Dense Poly-Flo, two layers of PollenTEC. Eco filter provides unsurpassed performance and durability. ASHRAE tested MERV rating of 7 to 8.
story_txt:
Welcome to Advanced Eco Filtration and our Indiegogo project where our dream is to make your home and office one of the best places on earth to breathe. Now you may be wondering why are we so passionate about your lungs and the air you inhale?Simply because your lungs are one of the most important organs in your body and recent scientific studies suggest that “indoor air-pollution” is a major cause of discomfort and even illness.

Reinventing The Air Filter 
While many of us focus on the foods we eat and the beverages we drink most times we ignore the air we breathe. At Advanced Eco Filtration we know there is a tremendous difference between air and quality air, which is why we take the air your inhale seriously.  
We utilize multi-layer filtration technology with PollenTEC filter media.

A revolutionary fabric, PollenTEC is a filter for your entire home allowing fresh air to flow indoors while filtering up to 100% of pollens and other harmful microscopic particals. PollenTEC has been hospital clean room tested certified by the European Center for Allergy Research Foundation.

How is our eco air filter different
Eco Air filters are made with PollenTEC material that has been tested and certified in a hospital setting for its effectiveness in capturing up to 100% of airborne pollen spores.
 
 
 
In 2009 we tested our first prototype  at an independent lab.
The results were better than we expected and much better than any other washable filter you could find on the market.

 
The new 1” Eco Air Filter is the finest washable, reusable air filter on the market. The new Eco Air Filter is a 1”  width air filter. The Eco Air filters are made with one layer of 1 ” Dense Poly-Flo and two layers of PollenTEC. Our Eco filters provide unsurpassed performance and durability.

 
Throw in the added benefit of being completely recyclable and we knew we had a hit, and one that will also pay for itself in the first year. Within the next four years, it is basically a free filter.

 
In 2012 we launched a unique service model for our commercial market. It is a complete reuse cycle where we deliver, change out and then clean our filters for the next use. It`s less expensive and reduces the buildings carbon foot-print.
 

Another exciting part of our mission and filter service is giving back to the community. We have partnered with STARS a community based rehabilitation center that facilitates training   for the handicapped to become independent by teaching them skills to work with local companies.
  
 
Think about this:
We worry about disposing water bottles improperly but when it comes to air filters many times the size and weight of a water bottle, we ignore the long- term effects on our planet. 

Homes, buildings, schools, hospitals all use some type of air filter.100% of all disposable filters end up in our country`s landfills. That’s well over a billion filters into our landfills every year.
 
Pledges / Pricing
Pledge $10.00 You receive the happy tulip certificate of appreciation personally signed by AEF founder Paul Honnen
 
 
$10.00 Pledge receives the Happy Tulip certificate of appreciation personally signed by the founder of AEF Paul Honnen
$15.00 Pledge Eco Filter or PollenTEC screening material you receive a $20 coupon to use at www.pollentec.com
$40 Pledge receives 1 Eco Air filter
$65 Pledge receives 2 - Pack 1” Eco Air filters
$120 Pledge receives the big house pack of 4 -1” Eco Air filters
$1,000 Pledge receives a $1200 coupon towards the purchase of our 1” or 2” commercial office building package with filter service.
$10,000 Pledge receives a $11,000 coupon towards the purchase of our 1” or 2” commercial office building package with filter service.
 
Why Indiegogo?
We've been working on our Eco air filters for over three years. We're very proud of the work we've done so far, but we need one more push so that we are able to run volume production.
Through Indiegogo you're ORDERING our Eco air filter. With your support, we will put our Eco air filters into homes and buildings nationwide and start helping millions of people and businesses save money, help our planet and create jobs for the handicapped. While we're able to produce filters on a small  limited scale, your contribution will help fund:


  Equipment for manufacturing and production.



  Bulk materials purchase


  Larger  facility

 
On behalf of your lungs, On behalf of our Environment, On behalf of the team at AEF and our partners at STARS, I want to personally thank you for taking the time to learn about our Indiegogo campaign and making our goal a reality.
At AEF we are working hard to make your home and office one of the best places on earth to breathe.
 

 
Comments, Questions, Partnerships?
Please check out our FAQ section below , or email us:
Email: paulh@advecofiltration.com
 or you can call us directly at 623-888-6304
And a final THANK YOU to our current partners & contributors!

story:
Short Summary

In 2009, Gia was diagnosed with Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia. She spent the next 2 years in treatment. She has just recently relapsed and is in need of your help. Gia has just undergone a bone marrow transplant at Memorial Sloan-Kettering Hospital in New York City. Hopefully this will be the last treatment she will endure.

With your generosity, you can help us reach our goal of helping the family with their financial burdens.

What We Need & What You Get

A donation of $5 will get you your choice of an Orange or Red/Orange wristband along with a thank you card designed and created by Gia.
 
A donation of $10 will get you your one of each Orange & Red/Orange wristband along with a thank you card designed and created by Gia.
 
A donation of $15 or more will get you a set number of wristbands of your choice and a thank you card designed and created by Gia.
 

The Impact

With your donation, you can help Gia and her family restore a sense of normalcy in their lives. Since Gia has undergone treatment, she has been back and forth into and out of the city. Your donation will help with the expenses of travelling to and from the city and living on the go.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are currently looking for volunteers for a fundraising event on October 6th, 2012. If you're interested, please visit http://giasstrength.com/register/ to volunteer today.
