story:
Over 16 years of actual use and thousands of human clinical trails have proven we have a safe, effective, drug-free, non-toxic way to slow the aging process and even reverse it.

It's not magic it's all about good old fashioned nutrition and lots of it.

From the moment you're born, you begin "growing" towards your death. The clock starts ticking and the cells in your body start to die. The good news is you can slow that process and build new healthy cells to not only prolong life but to enjoy a healthy life full of energy and without the common factors that take their toll on the aging of our citizens.

AsUage is a powerful mega-vitamin, with over 42 active, all-natural ingredients...vitamins, minerals, amino acids, herbs, anti-oxidants and nutrients to give you the nutritional supplementation you need.

NO OTHER MULTI-VITAMIN HAS THE QUANTITY OF INGREDIENTS AS ASUAGE

story:
Our Story

My name is Jordyn - I am a 17 year old girl from Northern Ontario and I have known countless children who have been affected by cancer. Countless children who have had so much potential, spirit, and hope. 

I am raising money for Northern Ontario Families of Children with Cancer (NOFCC). They are a registered charitable organization that is committed to helping families in Northeastern Ontario who have a child diagnosed with cancer. Their mission is to provide hope, support, advocacy and education to families who have a child with cancer.

My mission? To promote their stories and in turn raise money for the children out there who still have hope. My little brother Kieran is 6 years old and I cannot imagine how terrifying and devastating it would be if he were to develop cancer. We need to help this charity. 

The Impact

When a Northern Ontario family first gets news of their child's cancer, they are often transported to Sick Kids Hospital in Toronto... 5 hours away from their home, and must find accommodations in a foreign place. Their whole life has turned upside down and they have to worry about finances and the basic necessities of life.

Your donation will help those families to have peace of mind in a terrible situation. They will be provided with phone cards, gas checks and grocery cards, and most importantly, a place to stay. They will be able to live comfortably while they are away from home and have some financial relief. 

Be sure to read Olivia's story here, she is a 4 year old girl from my hometown of Sudbury: http://www.nofcc.ca/pdf/testamonials/olivia_moreira.pdf 


What We Need 

My goal is to raise $2000.00 in 38 days. If we can raise more money for NOFCC and these Northern Ontario Families in a shorter amount of time, I'd like to raise that amount to $4000.00 to help even more families of children with cancer! 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you do not have a credit card or the means to donate online, SPREAD THE WORD! Go on Facebook, Twitter, or any other social networking site and share the link to this page! The families of children with cancer in Northern Ontario need your help right now. Tell your friends, tell your family! If you know somebody who has been affected by cancer, donate today. 

More Information

To learn more about this charity and this cause, visit the NOFCC website below:
http://www.nofcc.ca/

story:
Our Story

Our journey began March 12th 2008 when I married my best friend. I had always known I wanted children and had started nannying in 2005 and haven't stopped since watching children. It was a no brainer to start trying to create a family together. We got pregnant and sadly miscarried shortly after.It was devastating but I picked up the pieces and thought it would only be a matter of time before I had a bouncing baby in my arms. Soon after my husband got orders to Portsmouth VA with the Navy. After 8 months I decided to make a appointment to see what was happening with my body, why wasn't I having a baby? We went to the appt. with the expectations of test and giving a detailed history but instead we were not taken seriously because of our age ( 21 & 23) I was handed a bottle of prenatals and sent on my way. Looking back it infuriates me that I wasn't taken seriously, I wanted a baby, I was there for answers and instead I was judged. 2 months Later in November we got orders to go to Japan. I was so upset I thought for sure my plans for a baby would be put on hold. When we arrived in Japan I got a job at the base daycare, and baby making was on hold until 2009. After being at the daycare I met a wonderful family that wanted a nanny, thats when I started watching Elijah & Isaiah. They were the light in my world after each month of negative tests they still brightened my day, they reminded me of what I would hopefully have one day. In August of 2010 I decided to go for testing again, this time the doctor took me seriously. Brandon was perfect and I was broken, I don't ovulate regularly on my own. It wasn't the answer I wanted but I was prepared, I had already done extensive research and knew the first step Clomid. We went through my birthday, Thanksgiving, Christmas & New years without a pregnancy. I couldn't believe it. I was doing everything plus some to get what others had come so easily to them. In the time I had done treatment I had friends get pregnant, lose a baby, and become pregnant again. It was so unfair, why couldn't it happen to me? January we decided to take a break to get ready to do injectables. On the way home from a youth sports game we coached I held my pee for almost 3 hours, I finally got home and said why waste it, I pee'ed on an ovulation kit and WHAM! What my body hadn't been doing it was finally doing it. Valentine's Day 2011 was the best day in 2011. I decided to take a pregnancy test and forgot all about it, I picked it up later fully expecting to see one lonely line, I started to cry I couldn't believe it was 2 pink lines. I called Brandon and was so excited, called the doctor for a blood test. I picked up the boys from school and we went to the hospital for blood test. We waited for the results, I was PREGNANT! Before I could celebrate DR.Q said it was a low HCG and we would do another draw on Monday. That weekend was excrutiating. I wanted to be happy but I couldn't let my self get excited. Monday came.........Numbers dropped to 5 it was a chemical pregnancy. I couldn't take it any more. In March the Tsunami disaster happened and I came home for a few weeks. When we got back I was ready to see a specialist off base in Japan. We went and yet again I was dissapointed. the doctor didn't listen to me and didn't take me seriously. We did 3 IUI with medications and still no pregnancy. So here we are a family that should have a baby without one.........

 

You can read and follow my blog too!

http://journeytobabybrents.blogspot.com/

 

The Impact

Something is missing from our family not even my three precious kitties can fill the void I feel in my life. I never thought this would be where I was, a 24 yr. old woman suffering from infertility. I remind myself everyday that this is the path God has chosen for me because He knows I am strong enough. I have been more open about our struggle and have answered countless questions. I talk t openly because I know one day I will say "I am struggling with infertility" and the reply would be "me too"

First let me say that we are not asking for a handout. We have lived frugally for the last 3 years paying off debt, and paying for treatments one at a time (in YEN mind you!) My husband could have stayed in the military but that wasn't his dream. He is going to school to be a special education teacher and hopes to be a football coach. It wasn't my dream to have the money to do IVF but have no father there for my baby. We are living with my parents to save for IVF and to build a home for our family but, it just doesn't seem right to have a home and not be able to fill it... Even with your donations we will still need to save the money for testing and medications. We will continue to live within our means. We know that having a baby is not cheap but we don't have thousands of dollars laying around waiting to be spent. So many take for granted the ability to create a baby for free, for everything we will go through to have a child, this kid will never say we didn't want them.

What We Need & What You Get

We are trying to do IVF with ICSI. Although our Goal will cover the Procedure it will not cover our medications and initial testing (another $3,000 at least) thats why we are looking for help with the procedure.

 http://www.fertilitycenter.com/

 

The 6,800 will cover:

Cycle monitoring including all ultrasounds

egg retrieval including anesthesia

Insemination of my little eggies using ICSI

embryo culture and transfer from cycle (take the eggies out put the eggies back in)

Blood pregnancy test following transfer

 

You may ask what if we don't raise our goal?

Although our goal is IVF any money raised will go towards some kind of treatment or medications for a treatment like IUI.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Every bit of money counts! We are so blessed to have so many family and friends that have asked to help, so we are making it easy and convenient for them. If you cant donate please pray for us and those like us and SPREAD THE WORD! Help us get our fundraiser out there and exposure!
 
Additionally for every dollar amount that we receive over our goal we will be donating it to other families like ours. Most couples that suffer from infertility have no insurance that covers treatment and will never have the chance to try IVF.

story:
Short Summary

More than 1 billion people on earth are lacking access to potable water. High levels of bacteria, other biological and chemical contaminants plague rural water supplies; municipal water, on the other hand, is often contaminated by high levels of chlorine (when treated), lead, chemicals and heavy metals.

Also, due to ever-increasing regional scarcity of water (droughts) we will be relying more and more on desalination of sea water for our drinking water.

The problem is that desalination is a very expensive process. Its' technology is extremely costly and it uses immense amounts of energy to remove salt from the sea water.

Strategic Water Resources, Inc. (SWR) of Mystic, CT SWR was created by a focused team of scientist, engineers and entrepreneurs that possess decades of unique experience and skill sets especially suited to tackling this growing crisis.

Our website: www.strategicwaterresources.net

SWR has developed a revolutionary technology, the Neptune CF (patent pending), which is unique to the world of water purification; it purifies water through a process we call "Forward Osmosis". What's so exciting about our Neptune CF is that it purifies water - to include desalination - at far lower costs than the traditional method, Reverse Osmosis.

In Reverse Osmosis the process of turning sea water into fresh water requires a great deal of energy.  It also needs large scale, specialized equipment whereas our Neptune CF uses far less energy and - the unit designed to produce 50,000 gallons per day -can fit into a 40' shipping container, in which it is housed.

It can also be powered by renewable energy.

Because SWR's Forward Osmosis System can be built economically on a far smaller scale and uses 80% less electricity than Reverse Osmosis, it could become a real "game changer" in terms of purifying and/or desalinating water economically.

Lower costs in turn, will make clean water accessible to far more people than at present.

There's also an additional benefit to SWR's Neptune CF:  a high concentration of reactive O1 gas is produced by SWR's proprietary process which, in effect, super oxygenates the purified water it produces. 

In preliminary trials this super-oxygenated water was shown to increase the rate of plant growth by 30%. Independent verification of these findings by two New England State Agricultural Departments is about to begin.

Once we receive these two States' "blessings", SWR will be positioned to provide hydroponic farms oxygen- enriched water supplies that will shorten growth cycle time while enhancing plant nutrient content. 

As a business we are in our infancy. SWR is less than a year old and is in its' “pre-revenue” phase; as in, we have yet to earn any money.

As a result we are seeking your support to help fund the crucial, 2nd phase of our growth.

If we were successful in raising $500,000, the following will become realty: 

We'll be able to cover day-to-day operations in the near term ($50,000) and we'll be able to build a scaled demonstration unit to be used as a precondition to entering the marketplace ($450,000).

The private sector has already reacted positively to Strategic Water Resources Neptune CF technology, as illustrated by a Letter of Intent we recently received from a Fortune 500 Company to deliver three desalination plants to locations in Panama, Columbia and the Caribbean.

We also have another dozen business deals, pending the construction of the scaled demonstration unit, to include:  Treatment of landfill leachate in Massachusetts; High oxygen process water for hydroponic greenhouse project; Water treatment plants in Pennsylvania; Wastewater treatment for a major seafood processor; etc.

Our potential market(s) is a vast one and if the early response from a cross-section of industries to SWR is any indication of what the future may hold then it will be  a very bright one. Provided of course, that we can raise the necessary money to keep going.

We are also very much committed to helping the third world overcome its' myriad water problems as soon as we're able. Our lower cost, smaller-scaled water projects, could make the difference between life and death for thousands of destitute people.

We thank you for considering our appeal.

All the best,

The SWR Team

Fitness Passion

For over 20 years I've been engrossed in the fitness world and searching for a way to make a decent, long-term living from my passion. Conceptualizing the Total Body Blueprint ecourse and FitRx Program took a couple years, and I've been avidly working on this project since January of this year.  

This program is my opportunity to make a career out of my passion and spread health and fitness to the public. Your contributions can help make this a reality by allowing me to build the website needed to market and sell the product. 

Budget

All of the elements have been created for Total Body Blueprint and the FitRx Program, now it's time to put all the pieces of the puzzle together in developing the website.

With $8,000, I've funded all the expenses to date - studio rental for filming the ecourse videos, editing them, exercise clip shooting and editing, voice over, back end website platform and mobile app (Trainerize) and website hosting. 

The website design and development (functionality) is estimated to be $10,000. There were 4 teams I collaborated with, all of them giving similar quotes, but have decided I'd like to build the site with Jason Lengstorf of Copter Labs. He's been an excellent resource in building my brand.

Copter Labs website/portfolio: http://www.copterlabs.com/

FitRx Program

Sequenced, 6-month exercise program 

All the components of Total Body Blueprint (warm-ups, weight training, cardio and flexibility) are integrated into a manageable periodized program. Every month, you’ll enter a new phase with possibly a different training split, new exercises, rep ranges, intensities, cardio methods and/or circuits to prevent stagnation and boredom.

Private website with workout tracking 

Gain access to your private account to printout or track workouts, view training calendars and monitor progress using grids and graphs with my online platform 24/7. An excellent tool for motivation. You’ll also be able to learn proper mechanics by watching short exercise demonstrations of me with detailed instructions using the exercise library.

Mobile application with exercise demos 

Download a mobile app that coincides with the website, allowing you to record each workout while in the gym. And brush up on how to perform the movements prescribed by viewing exercise clips.

Biometric tracking 

To measure progress, we first establish a baseline. We then set a goal using an “ideal bodyweight” calculation. Once per month you’ll track progress by measuring body composition with one of my suggested methods and muscle circumferences with a tape measure. Don’t worry, I’ll teach you exactly how to do everything, and it’s all tracked and graphed for you online. Some weeks you just step on a scale and provide your bodyweight. The important thing is that you will always have objective data to go on – not just opinions.

Progress photos

The body transformation process is at least in part subjective and about how you look. Every month you’ll take new photos and upload them, and periodically compare them to where you started. That will provide much of the motivation you need to keep moving forward.

Nutritional guidance 

Diets. They've become a cliché, haven't they? We're on them, then we're off. People follow them only for a short period, if at all, and it usually ends in failure. Diets are useless and unrealistic. I do things very differently here. I teach you lean healthy eating without starving yourself. You’ll also be provided with tasty recipes and a tutorial on how to use the fitbit modality for accountability purposes. Eventually, your eating habits will come so naturally to you that it becomes automatic, for the rest of your life.

Results 100% guaranteed

My belief is this: if you invest in a fitness program – and you do what I’ve prescribed – you should get the results you want. I’m supremely confident with FitRx, and you should be too. So if you give the program 6 months, follow my workout plans and log them at least 80 percent of the time, you’ll be leaner, stronger, healthier and happier with your physique than you ever thought you could be. And if you’re not, the program is completely free. Simple as that.

Who’s it for? 

  • Men between 18 and 65 years old.
  • You want to decrease body fat and change your body composition.
  • You’re prioritizing fat loss, but you also want some more muscle.
  • You want to feel healthier, stronger and have more energy.
  • You’re busy and want an extremely time-efficient program.
  • You are committed to consistently allocating 3 hours per week to fitness.
  • You want to find ways to work around chronic injuries and even recover from them.
  • You’re looking to improve your stamina and posture.

Total Body Blueprint

The video at the top of the page is the first module of Total Body Blueprint. You can view the second module on resistance training by clicking on the Gallery tab above.

This is my 5-week free ecourse that covers all of the components to fitness:

Cardio and Weight Loss

You’ll learn why interval training is more effective than conventional aerobic exercise, and how to perform cardio bouts to optimize your fat loss.

Resistance Training Fundamentals

You’ll learn how to integrate weight-training parameters—sets, rep cadence, load selection, progression, and rest periods—into your workouts to help change your body composition.

Flexibility Techniques

An integral part of any fitness program, you’ll learn myofacial release and foam rolling techniques, passive and active stretches, dynamic warm-ups, and how to improve posture.

Nutritional Strategies

Because exercise is only one part of the fitness equation, I’ll teach you how to apply practical nutritional principles to lose fat and build muscle, and show you exactly what foods to eat.

Supplementation

You’ll learn which supplements on the market are safe and effective in improving health, building muscle, and shedding fat—and which ones to avoid.

Exercise Clips

There are over 200 exercises, stretches and dynamic warm-ups included in the 6-month program. These are still in the process of being edited, but I have shared a few within the Video Gallery (click on "Gallery" above). The voice over will be added last using the exercise descriptions I've written.

Trainerize


Trainerize is the back end website platform I am using for the virtual routines. Here you'll be able to log and track your workouts, record biometrics and view exercise demonstrations. Everything is streamlined within the portal and provides a step-by-step system for the client.

Trainerize website: http://www.trainerize.com/

If you want me to send you a workout routine through Trainerize so you can get a feel for it, I'd be happy to do so.

Thanks for taking the time to read about my project, I hope you consider getting involved by making a donation.
story_txt:
Fitness Passion
 For over 20 years I've been engrossed in the fitness world and searching for a way to make a decent, long-term living from my passion. Conceptualizing the Total Body Blueprint ecourse and FitRx Program took a couple years, and I've been avidly working on this project since January of this year.  
This program is my opportunity to make a career out of my passion and spread health and fitness to the public. Your contributions can help make this a reality by allowing me to build the website needed to market and sell the product. 

Budget All of the elements have been created for Total
 Body Blueprint and the FitRx Program, now it's time to put all the 
pieces of the puzzle together in developing the website.
With 
$8,000, I've funded all the expenses to date - studio rental for filming
 the ecourse videos, editing them, exercise clip shooting and editing, 
voice over, back end website platform and mobile app (Trainerize) and website hosting. 
The
 website design and development (functionality) is estimated to be 
$10,000. There were 4 teams I collaborated with, all of them giving 
similar quotes, but have decided I'd like to build the site with Jason 
Lengstorf of Copter Labs. He's been an excellent resource in building my
 brand. 
Copter Labs website/portfolio: http://www.copterlabs.com/
  FitRx Program



Sequenced, 6-month exercise program 
All the components of Total
Body Blueprint (warm-ups, weight training, cardio and flexibility) are
integrated into a manageable periodized program. Every month, you’ll enter a
new phase with possibly a different training split, new exercises, rep ranges,
intensities, cardio methods and/or circuits to prevent stagnation and boredom. 
Private website with workout tracking 
Gain access to your private
account to printout or track workouts, view training calendars and monitor progress
using grids and graphs with my online platform 24/7. An excellent tool for
motivation. You’ll also be able to learn proper mechanics by watching
short exercise demonstrations of me with detailed instructions using the
exercise library. 
Mobile application with exercise demos 
Download a mobile app that coincides with the website,
allowing you to record each workout while in the gym. And brush up on how to
perform the movements prescribed by viewing exercise clips.
Biometric tracking 
To measure progress, we first establish a baseline. We then
set a goal using an “ideal bodyweight” calculation. Once per month you’ll track
progress by measuring body composition with one of my suggested methods and
muscle circumferences with a tape measure. Don’t worry, I’ll teach you exactly
how to do everything, and it’s all tracked and graphed for you online. Some
weeks you just step on a scale and provide your bodyweight. The important thing
is that you will always have objective data to go on – not just
opinions. 
Progress photos 
The body transformation process is at least in part
subjective and about how you look. Every month you’ll take new photos and
upload them, and periodically compare them to where you started. That will
provide much of the motivation you need to keep moving forward.
Nutritional guidance 
Diets. They've become a cliché, haven't they? We're on them,
then we're off. People follow them only for a short period, if at all, and it usually
ends in failure. Diets are useless and unrealistic. I do things very
differently here. I teach you lean healthy eating without starving yourself.
You’ll also be provided with tasty recipes and a tutorial on how to use the fitbit
modality for accountability purposes. Eventually, your eating habits will come
so naturally to you that it becomes automatic, for the rest of your life.
Results
100% guaranteed 
My belief is this: if
you invest in a fitness program – and you do what I’ve prescribed – you should
get the results you want. I’m supremely confident with FitRx, and you should be
too. So if you give the program 6 months, follow my workout plans and log them at least 80
percent of the time, you’ll be leaner, stronger,
healthier and happier with your physique than you ever thought you could be. And
if you’re not, the program is completely free. Simple as that.


Who’s it for?  


Men between 18
and 65 years old.
You want to
decrease body fat and change your body composition.

You’re prioritizing
fat loss, but you also want some more muscle.

You want to feel
healthier, stronger and have more energy.

You’re busy and
want an extremely time-efficient program.

You are
committed to consistently allocating 3 hours per week to fitness.

You want to find
ways to work around chronic injuries and even recover from them.

You’re looking
to improve your stamina and posture.

story:
With your help we can stop damage to children’s health and teeth by ending the release of an unnecessary and toxic acid into our City of Ottawa water.  This acid harms pets and wildlife and is contaminating our environment and waterways.

What We Need 

With your help, we can fund the first of 3 stages in the effort to obtain a Permanent Injunction (permanent stop) from the Court.  Much work has already been done in collating the evidence and identifying the main medical and research experts. Now we need the legal experts.  We have a team ready to move forward now.

Of course, we hope the City will not waste taxpayer dollars on supporting a practice that is immoral, unethical and violates the rights of its citizens and especially the children who cannot speak for themselves. But we are preparing for a long legal journey and this is the first step.

The lobby groups, such as the dental association, have very deep pockets.  We believe that doing right for the children can win the day because there are more people who care about children and the environment than there are people who are cavalier about harming others for profit.

& What You Get

Once this horrific practice is stopped, you can be proud that the next beautiful white smile you see from a child was the result of your generous assistance.   Your investment will help ensure that no more children are forced to drink water containing an acid that permanently disfigures teeth.

Any excess funding will go to assisting other communities who want free of this harmful practice...maybe even to your community.  All monies will be paid into the legal firm’s trust fund and properly accounted for. 

The Impact of Your Caring

We have appealed to the conscience of our Councilors for years, provided binders of scientific evidence of harm, especially to children and infants, to no avail. We have arranged meetings with many councilors, some have refused to meet, others have deferred to the opinion of the Medical Officer of Health who refuses altogether to consider the independent scientific findings. 

Many of our supporters have submitted Withdrawals of Consent to be mass-medicated by registered mail and not a single one received a response, although under the Health Care Consent Act, everyone has a right to refuse such medication.

We have pled that the mass-medication of an entire population with a harmful substance is a gross violation of our Charter of Rights and Freedoms not to be harmed by our municipality on the say-so of lobby groups.  We are told we can simply buy an expensive reverse-osmosis system to remove the acid and the other toxins it contributes, such as arsenic, lead and mercury 

The photo gallery provides just a sampling of what happens to children’s teeth. It’s called dental fluorosis and could cost as much as $50,000 in cosmetic dental procedures to keep covering up over a life-time because the disfigurement is permanent.  

The impact of succeeding with this project is significant for thousands upon thousands of young children and those not even born yet, who have no choice in the matter. This would also set a legal precedent to help other communities battling lobby group opinions and misinformation on fluoridation.




How bad can dental fluorosis get.....?



Risks & Challenge

We believe, based on the legal opinions reviewed so far, that the risks of not succeeding are low, since the various courts have always upheld a citizen’s right not to be harmed by its government and government policies.

Based on the latest scientific study results and on hearing Attorney Nader Hassan present his legal opinion on the issue (see video below), we believe we now have a great chance of obtaining a Permanent Injunction from the Courts to force the City to stop fluoridating our drinking water with Hydrofluorosilicic Acid or other similar acid -- all industrial waste products from the fertilizer industry.  

The challenges are only those regarding the funding of the legal team, but we are deeply caring individuals who simply cannot leave any stone unturned until this crime against children is ended.  We hope you will join us in the fight to have our municipalities do right by its children citizens.

Video of attorney presentation to Peel region council:  


Dentists say a little disfigurement is no big deal considering the practice may (note the “may”) prevent dental cavities. Yet there is no proof it prevents anything, with lots of proof it causes great harm.

Other Ways You Can Help

·  If you live in Ottawa or another fluoridated community, write to your Council Member and insist they work to end this practice.  Provide them with the video above to alert them to their potential liability for continuing this practice.

·  If you don’t live in Ottawa, write to the Mayor of Ottawa advising that you will reconsider Ottawa as a tourism destination in order to avoid having to ingest this fluoride acid.

·  Write a letter to the editor of the local newspapers

story:
This is the story of Carrie Browes-Hartwell....

Carrie Hartwell is a 43 year old home maker and mother of four children living in Newcastle, Ontario, Canada.

She woke up one morning about 16 years ago with double vision, had numerous test done, no answers. Later a .6mm Pineal Cystic Tumor found on MRI. With difficulty, she adjusted and learned to live with it.

Fast forward to Feb 2013, severe headache (the worst she ever had), then from there more headaches, migraines, throwing up, severe anxiety, head pressure, and double vision became much worse. After 5 months of seeing countless doctors she finally got someone to listen to her, had a MRI and the cystic tumor had more than doubled to 1.3 cm and has been as big as 1.7cm.

"It seems like I see multiple images but I can’t really tell how many and can no longer tune it out. The vision problem is 24/7 and never goes away. It’s hard to explain but my vision feels like it is getting close to being cross-eyed or twisted. I do not remember what it is to see only one of anything. I have been told that I show symptoms of Perinaud’s Syndrome, but not consistently. My vision is blurry at times mostly with digital clocks, the guide on the T.V. and when I am lying down. I have been told I can’t possibly see the way I see by more than one Neuro-Opthamologist."  - Carrie

The headaches and migraines come and go. She also has severe exhaustion to the point where she goes back to bed numerous times a day but does not sleep.

She has been suffering every day since February, 2013.

She has episodes of numbness in my feet, hands, face and tongue, pain on the top back left side of her head, sometimes burning, it continues to worsen and now hurts when she lies down.

She cannot get through a day without medication to cope with how she sees and the severe anxiety.

"I say words wrong, fumble for what I am trying to say at times. I have eye pressure and pain, my eyes are often red and sensitive to light, mostly sun."

She now has severe mood swings and hair trigger temper. She is easily overwhelmed, bothered by noise, and by more than one thing happening at once. Carrie cannot sleep without taking melatonin or a sleeping pill and sometimes feels like her feet are dragging have to tell them what to do. She feels like she vibrates on the inside sometimes – and a feeling she can’t explain – just a really sick feeling. Carrie is weak, dizzy and nauseous, with a shortness of breath every day. It’s like she forgets to breathe and then catches her breath.

Carrie has had numerous test done for M.S. etc. – negative. She has spent thousands of dollars with a Naturopath trying to shrink the cyst – no luck.

She has a great neurosurgeon, in Kingston Ontario. The powers that be in Canada don’t seem to believe in symptomatic pineal cysts and no one will or can help her.

"My life is severely altered by this. Without substaintial medication, I would be bed-ridden. Seeing more than one of my children and husband is heartbreaking. I am constantly having to go lie down (back to bed) whether it be from fatigue or not being able to deal with commotion. I am equally terrified that if the cystic tumor stays in there my vision will worsen or will get worse if I have it removed."

The surgery is in the top 30% of the most dangerous neuro-surgeries you could have. Best case s, Carrie would always have these symptoms, most likely worsening and worse case, lose her ability to walk.

The surgery is out of pocket and could cost upwards of 100,000 Dollars

_______________________________________________________________________

Carrie is scheduled to go to the States and get treatment. Every bit helps....
Do you think you can help? Please donate what you can to help Carrie get the surgery she needs to get better.

story:
Feed the cadets during finals and show your battalion spirit!! 

It's the battle of the battalions!!

The 3rd Battalion cadets will be hungry during late night cramming sessions for finals.  Send them tasty gourmet jerky in a variety of flavors to stave off those hunger pangs and fuel their finals prep!  Plus, show the other battalions that 3rd Battalion has the most dedicated supporters!

Donate here to fund the 3rd Battalion jerky purchase!

Results will be posted on the Facebook pages each week showing how much each battalion has raised to feed the cadets.  

It's a head-to-head competition ... may the best battalion win!

Don't let 3rd Battalion be beaten by the rest!  Donate today!

The details: Proceeds will be used to help BSA Troop 160 fund-raise for a trip to Mount Rushmore. Donations (less processing charges from indiegogo) will be used to purchase jerky from Country Meats Smoked Snacks, in a variety of flavors, to be delivered during finals to 3rd Battalion.  Jerky sticks are sold and shipped by the case so only full cases will be purchased - leftover funds will be donated directly to the troop. One dollar buys one jerky stick (after processing charges from indiegogo have been deducted).

story:
I'm trying to raise funds for Pam who will be donating a kidney to her sister on November 12.  Pam is a modest woman of 61 years who lives alone and works as a home health care aide and a house cleaner as her sole source of income.  This campaign is to simply replace the money she will not earn during her six weeks of recovery.

Pam is a volunteer with the Pemi Valley Search and Rescue Team of Franconia, NH.  Two years ago while on a solo hike of Mt. Washington in winter conditions, Pam came upon a man in shorts, a t-shirt and clearly suffering from hypothermia.  Pam was able to get him into warm clothes and convince him to follow her down the mountain.  A few weeks later,  the man sent an anonymous letter and donation to our team, telling a chilling story that he was trying to commit suicide that day, but due to Pam's kindness, persistance and compassion, he survived and sought professional treatment.

Pam is always thinking of others, including now with a kidney donation.  Can we raise $2,500 dollars so that she doesn't have to worry about her expenses?  I'm hoping that we can do this with relatively small donations by a lot of people.  This is a short campaign because I just learned of her economic hardship.

Thank you for anything you can offer, even $5 or $10 is great!

story:
peacecare

peacecare, a nonprofit organization that cultivates collaborative, community-level global health solutions is working on a project in the SNNPR region of Ethiopia to prevent Maternal mortality using a technique called ALSO® (Advanced Life Support in Obstetrics), which teaches physicians, midwives and other healthcare workers to prevent and manage emergencies during labor and delivery.

Through a partnership with Peace Corps, this peacecare project fosters collaboration between the health district of Bonga, Ethiopia and Northwestern University to improve health care delivery within the local existing health care system.

cost effective interventions

Using the 'training of trainers' method, the team from Northwestern will be training Ethiopian healthcare workers to train other local healthcare workers in the ALSO® technique, improving sustainability and cost effectiveness of the project.  This technique is knowledge-based and does not call for many material resources, making it appropriate in a low-resource setting.    ALSO® is used to train physicians, midwives, and nurses all across the United States and in over fifty other countries worldwide.    It has been studied in other developing countries and shown to decrease obstetrical complications such as hemorrhage after delivery.

All contributions go to on-the-ground costs and any small contribution will go a long way.

impact

One of the UN Millenium Development goals is to "Reduce by three quarters, between 1990 and 2015, the maternal mortality ratio."  Most maternal deaths are avoidable with increased education and training.  The peacecare project addresses this goal of preventing needless deaths in the developing countries like Ethiopia, by building the capacity and empowering its own healthcare workers to provide high-quality care to their fellow Ethiopians.

how you can help

Any little bit counts, donate $1 dollar and spread the word. No amount will go unnoticed. Please post on your facebook, twitter and tell all of your friends!

In the developed world, we have access to the care and to trained healthcare workers when we need it.  Please help women in the developing world have access to simple care that can save their lives and the lives of their newborns.

http://www.peacecare.org

http://peacecareworld.blogspot.com

http://www.facebook.com/peacecare.org
story_txt:
peacecare
peacecare, a nonprofit organization that cultivates collaborative, community-level global health solutions is working on a project in the SNNPR region of Ethiopia to prevent Maternal mortality using a technique called ALSO® (Advanced Life Support in Obstetrics), which teaches physicians, midwives and other healthcare workers to prevent and manage emergencies during labor and delivery.
Through a partnership with Peace Corps, this peacecare project fosters collaboration between the health district of Bonga, Ethiopia and Northwestern University to improve health care delivery within the local existing health care system.


cost effective interventions
Using the 'training of trainers' method, the team from Northwestern will be training Ethiopian healthcare workers to train other local healthcare workers in the ALSO® technique, improving sustainability and cost effectiveness of the project.  This technique is knowledge-based and does not call for many material resources, making it appropriate in a low-resource setting.    ALSO® is used to train physicians, midwives, and nurses all across the United States and in over fifty other countries worldwide.    It has been studied in other developing countries and shown to decrease obstetrical complications such as hemorrhage after delivery.
All contributions go to on-the-ground costs and any small contribution will go a long way.
impact


One of the UN Millenium Development goals is to "Reduce by three quarters, between 1990 and 2015, the maternal mortality ratio."  Most maternal deaths are avoidable with increased education and training.  The peacecare project addresses this goal of preventing needless deaths in the developing countries like Ethiopia, by building the capacity and empowering its own healthcare workers to provide high-quality care to their fellow Ethiopians.

how you can help


Any little bit counts, donate $1 dollar and spread the word. No amount will go unnoticed. Please post on your facebook, twitter and tell all of your friends!



In the developed world, we have access to the care and to trained healthcare workers when we need it.  Please help women in the developing world have access to simple care that can save their lives and the lives of their newborns.
http://www.peacecare.org
http://peacecareworld.blogspot.com
http://www.facebook.com/peacecare.org

story:
Jacques Gonzales grew up in San Antonio. He is a single father of 3 children that became a truck driver to support his family. He recently had a son who is now 1 years old. He finally decided to get off the road after winning numerous awards for safe driving for 15 years without an accident and on the morning of the shooting, was offered a job to be home every night so he could be with his loved ones. He was just hours away from achieving something he had worked towards for over 20 years. To be able to be home every night to hug his family, but was shot while grabbing sunglasses out of his truck. Be sure to watch the news story to see how much he is loved in San Antonio.

He has 3 children, ages 23, 11 and 1..and was not expected to live but by the grace of God and many prayers of those that love him, He is alive!! He is still but still faces major head trauma surgery in the near future. He cant drive, can’t remember things and he can not support his family or pay his medical bills. He needs your help!!! We pray you will donate anything you can. All amounts are appreciated. 

Sincerely, 

 

Gonzales Family and Friends :)

story:
Hi, my name is Holley, I am a mother of 4 children. On September 2, 2012 my daughter fell ill out of no where, we were admitted into the WVU Children's Hospital were we spent 3 weeks getting tests done on a daily basis along with blood work. We still do not have any idea what has caused her to be sick.

She is on 24 hour tube feeds with not being able to have anything by mouth. Her tube goes into her small intestine. They doctors have done all kinds of things and now are trying her on new meds to see if they will help. All they know is that her stomach has went to sleep so to speak. We have got over $30,000 in medical bills so far and our insurance has only picked up about $14,000 of that.

We are trying to raise money to help with at least part of the medical bills. We are also going to try and use part of it to help with the cost of her feeds. It is costing around $15- $20 a day just for her feeds. I would not ask for help if it weren't for it being so much and for the fact that since she has got sick that I lost my job and my husband had to miss a few days of work.

All the money that we get raised will go toward her feeds and medical bills that are still adding up. Please find it in your hearts to help us as we try to get her back to being a healthy normal 5 year old.

Thank You all for reading and God Bless you.

Please pass this on and get the word out even if you are unable to help us.

It is costing around $15- $20 a day just for her feeds. I would not ask for help if it weren't for it being so much and for the fact that since she has got sick that I lost my job and my husband had to miss a few days of work.
All the money that we get raised will go toward her feeds and medical bills that are still adding up. Please find it in your hearts to help us as we try to get her back to being a healthy normal 5 year old.

Please pass this on and get the word out even if you are unable to help us.

story:
"According to the Arthritis Disease Center, 50 to 80 percent of Americans complain of back pain during their lifetime, and poor posture is a common contributor to neck and back pain." 



You're not alone. We’re all setting ourselves up for failure in the posture department. For one, we sit hunched over our computers or phones all day long, a very unnatural position for the human body. Then, we go home and sleep on a pillow that only makes things worse by pushing our heads forward for 8 hours a night. It’s no wonder we all have bad posture, back pain, and stiff necks. Other posture pillows have tried to help correct this, but they’re uncomfortable, making it hard to do what you actually need to do on them: SLEEP.

And that's why we created the True Pillow. It's the only posture pillow that’s designed with your comfort and posture in mind so you can wake up refreshed; ready to take on the day. 

 

 

True Pillow comfortably supports your head, neck, and back while improving your posture thanks to its patent-pending design. It's unique shape fixes forward head posture by restoring the curve in your cervical spine while lightly stretching your neck muscles to their natural state.

True Pillow’s long wedge was strategically designed to keep your chest up while keeping your shoulders down to the mattress. This restores your overly-rounded upper back curve while fixing rounded shoulders. Sleep on True Pillow for just 30 nights to look and feel more confident than ever before. 

Eliminate irritating tension in your neck and upper back that you thought were just “part of life”. True Pillow doesn’t discriminate when it comes to sleeping position either. You can sleep comfortably on your back or your side.

You might even find you’re getting a lot more dates thanks to True Pillow (ladies love a man with good posture). 

True Pillow is made of 100% memory foam, a material designed to give comfortable support. It comes with a fitted, washable white, black, or grey zip cover.

                       


 

 


 

 An unnatural neck curve damages your discs and vertebra which will cause a lifetime of neck pain and headaches. And nobody wants to walk around with an embarrassing Dowager's Hump ("Granny Hump"). 

 


 

 

 

 

Artem Cheban
Marketing/Branding

Andrey Andriyk
Product Design

Igor Cheban
Illustrator/Artwork 

Daniel Vataman
Photography/Video

Fix Your Posture While Sleeping - True Pillow

story:
So you decided you want to buy some weights and workout at home, Great! But where do you begin? Should you buy dumbbells or kettlebells? What is the right weight for you? What if you’ll need to level up? You’ll need to buy new weights, and who has space for it? No worries, We got you! 

Practix is a fitness product designed to solve exactly these problems.

By combining an adjustable kettlebell and dumbbell into one product, Practix allows you to have versatile workouts at your own home without any space limitations.

Kettlebell, dumbbell or single plate training are all possible with one Practix set. The unique locking mechanism of Practix allows you to adjust the weight fast and easy with the “Click&Turn” release.

 


 

We are offering two products for you to choose from. Both M25 and M45 emphasize the core values and benefits of Practix. They are highly compact, adjustable and beautifully designed to increase your swag ;)

What will you get when ordering M25:

Smaller in size, greater in mobility. The M25 is Ideal if you want to work out in the park or wish to have some weights with you in the back of your trunk. The M25 replaces 4 kettlebells and 3 dumbbells.

What will you get when ordering M45:

Larger in size, greater in versatility. The M45 is Ideal for personal trainers, who carry their gear to customer’s houses, and for those who lack the floor space and like to grow muscles. The M45 replaces 7 kettlebells and 6 dumbbells.

 


You can really store it anywhere! We managed to shrink an entire rack to half the size of a basketball. 

 

Practix fitness product comes in different colors, that will fit your everyday style. Take a look at the color options and choose your style.

You workout to look and feel good, We think your gear should look and feel as good as you. 

We designed Practix with this notion in mind, no more hiding your bulky weights in the closet. Display it! be proud of it!

 

 

Changing weights can be a hustle, especially when performing high-intensity workouts. That’s why we created Click&Turn. A unique locking mechanism, safe, fast and easy to use, making it Ideal for rapid weight change. This allowed us to use shorter bars without limiting the addition of more plates. For you, it means easier setup, less adjusting time and minimal storage space.
 

Safety was our main focus when designing the locking mechanism. We combined two steps locking systems, the first is a butterfly screw and the second is a strong bolt, similar to a key and a lock. With ¼ of a turn the butterfly interlocks the plates to each other and the strong bolt automatically locks it in place. The plates won’t turn counter clockwise until the user releases the bolt.

Removing weights is just as easy as adding them. You can remove each plate individually or few of them at once. Just press the button of the weight you want to remove and turn the plate counter clockwise.
Another huge benefit derived from the design of Practix is the ability to add extra weight to your original device. How does it work? If you have a double set, click out the relevant plates from your second set and click it in easily to your dumbbell / kettlebell of use (As shown in the GIF below). There are no restrictions regarding plates attachments, you can add a 7.5lb plate on top of a 2.5lb plate and vice versa. This option is currently available only to those who purchased a double set.  

What is the maximum weight (combining two sets)?  

M45: Kettlebell - 75lb Dumbbell – 60lb  

M25: Kettlebell – 40lb Dumbbell – 30lb

0

For the past two years, we have been perfecting the design, working with personal trainers and designers to get the best product possible for you to enjoy and today you can see the outcome in this campaign.


When ordering  you’ll receive two-years warranty on weight plates and locking mechanisms. The weights come with impact resistant rubber finish to prevent damage to floors and equipment. Durable rubber coated handles and waterproof materials, ideal for outdoor training. For more information visit our website.

story:
Short Summary

Samdong International is a not-for-profit NGO launched to provide the world community with sustainable development support and social welfare corporation, based on the founding idea that all of mankind is one family.
After the devastating earthquake this week in Nepal, we are asking your help to support our grassroots efforts there to bring emergency relief and essential aid to the most vulnerable sectors of the community.   At present, reports suggest that 3,200 people have been killed and more than 6000 injured.  In addition, tens of thousands of people have been left homeless; while others are sleeping on the streets due to constant aftershocks and building instabilities.
With a grassroots presence on the ground, Samdong International pledges to get your donation dollars into action without delay, without red tape, and with deep collaboration with the local people to answer real needs in real lives. 

PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS TIME SENSITIVE- THIS CAMPAIGN WILL LAST UNTIL MAY 11TH.  WE ASK THAT IF YOU HAVE THE HEART TO GIVE, PLEASE DON'T HESITATE.   HELP IS NEEDED IMMEDIATELY!

What We Need 

With a 5 year grassroots presence in Nepal and staff currently in place on the ground on Nepal and in Korea,  we are well poised to make a real, immediate difference in the survival of Nepalese people.  We are asking for support to transition our Community Center and surrounding grounds in Kathmandu, which has survived the quake unscathed, into an emergency refugee housing center, soup kitchen, and  emergency medical field center.  

Funds will go to support:

1.  Beds

2.  Blankets

3.  Medical Supplies

4. Clean Water

5.  Food

6.  Tents

7.  Mosquito Nets

8. Rehydration Salts and Zinc Tablets

Impacts

The impacts of your donations will be felt by real people with real needs.   The days immediately following disaster are the most essential in determining who will survive and who will perish due to exposure to the elements, lack of food resource, illness, untreated injury, or dehydration.  Ensure that we can combat these threats together.
With a long term presence in Nepal, Samdong International will also be there to transition from emergency management into planning for the future and rebuilding, in solidarity with the people of Nepal. 

Risks & Challenges

The greatest challenges facing the work now lie in the areas of sourcing needed goods, and communicating reliably with the affected areas.  We will interface on the ground level with larger international agencies, such as the RED CROSS and CARE, helping to gain access to needed resources and offering our services to people most in need. 
As we watch the economic situation on the ground, it will be left to Samdong    Financial Advisory team to decide the best course of action to make the funds    stretch the furthest, whether we import goods from Korea once transportation    into Nepal becomes an option, or we source within the country.           

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to donate but still want to help, please share this campaign on any and all of your social media platforms,  under the hashtag #standwithnepal.

We thank you deeply from the bottom of our hearts.  Let's all stand together for Nepal!  One World, One Family!

story:
Short Summary

On 05/01/2015, I went to Nepal to distribute over 100 clean birth kits.  Our focus is to take provisions for babies and pregnant / new mothers, who are in need of safe and hygienic delivery provisions, among other goods & services.  As you may know, I had two complicated pregnancies; and was at risk of losing my twins at the brink of viability.  Only as a result of modern medicine and God's grace, am I blessed with my angels.  Your assistance is deeply meaningful to me, personally.

Need & Impact

I set a target which represents 5 USD for every Facebook friend I have.  We recognize that women and babies may have acute and specific unmet needs that are not covered by traditional relief, and that are exacerbated by the recent crisis. We also realize that they may not be the segment of the population with most access to relief.

We began with focusing on clean birth kits (consisting of basics for home baby delivery: soap, blade, plastic sheet, gloves, umbilical cord clamp, alcohol pads, cotton, disposable bag), as with the destruction of roads and health facilities - especially in remote and rural parts - home delivery will be even more likely. Nepal already has one of the highest home birth rates of around 60%.

That said, we recognize that we must assess the greatest needs of these mothers and babies and this was just a start. In terms of distribution, based on what we have seen on the ground, there are different channels with unique strengths and we are still assessing the optimal channels. For now, we have taken a portfolio approach, partnering with Himalayan Disaster Relief Volunteer Group (at The Yellow House) movement led by Nayantara Gurung Kakshapati (an impressive early grassroots relief effort; http://himalayandisaster.org/;https://www.facebook.com/pages/Himalayan-Disaster-Relief-Volunteer-Group/1102983003061793?fref=nf), BibekSheel Nepali (although political, running a great early relief effort;https://www.facebook.com/bibeksheelnepali), and One Heart World-Wide (http://www.oneheartworld-wide.org/). We are also beginning discussions with Save the Children and CARE this week. And we recognize that the government have a community health care worker system, which we will consider.

The goal is to supplement NOT replace the significant and efficient efforts of organizations like the UNFPA. It is way to empower us to have a DIRECT impact. 

And we hope to move from delivery of provisions to EDUCATING women and health workers in the consequences associated with decisions made about sanitation and nutrition regarding mothers, i.e. why it is important to use limited water to help post-partum women clean up, why limited food must also be shared with pregnant women, and more.  This aspect is currently being discussed.

As such, the values of this campaign:

EVOLVING & LEARNING: Different partners will be appropriate as we go from emergency to rebuilding infrastructure. We are assessing needs and partners as we go.

TRANSPARENT: We are being clear with partners that we need accountability of goods as much as possible, and intend to share this with all members of the campaign.

DEMOCRATIC: We aim to facilitate a lively discussion on the state of mothers and babies, especially after the earthquake. We would like you to have a say in where the funds are applied. So, feel free to share your views.

Please, recognize that this is finite campaign over the next 50 days to do as much as we can for the cause. The aim is to raise at least, $7000 USD to be applied over time. Please, visit the campaign site directly.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you prefer more formal channels, please consider UNFPA, CARE, and Save the Children. Or, see this:  http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2015/05/04/nepal-earthquake-sanitary-pads_n_7204758.html.  The idea is to give and support by spreading the word about these mothers and babies, whichever effort.  Also, they are not just in need today, but over a medium- and long-term in this aftermath of this tragedy and this should be considered.

Or, see this:  http://www.huffingtonpost.com/2015/05/04/nepal-earthquake-sanitary-pads_n_7204758.html.  The idea is to give and support by spreading the word about these mothers and babies, whichever effort.  Also, they are not just in need today, but over a medium- and long-term in this aftermath of this tragedy and this should be considered.

story:
Dear friends, family, loves, and allies of Angie Terry,

As many of you are already aware, Angie has been working/$aving and living for/looking forward to a day with NO BREASTS.  Angie has pursued this goal with intention and vigor, and managed to save the majority of the cost associated with this incredibly expensive procedure on their own.

Now, its our turn. I’m calling on you for your support!

Those of us who have never required surgery that wasn’t financially supported by our health insurance: consider this your dues! And those of us who have previously received the support of our communities in the midst of a similar process: share the love!

The most valuable and tangible way you can show Angie your support in this process is to DONATE! Help Angie acquire the final $3,00 they need to get Top Surgery, finally and for gooooooood.

If you’re not in a position to donate financially, consider donating a good or service for our growing list of perks!

If you would like to connect with Angie personally with supportive words, questions, and matcha shots, or dark chocolate you may contact them directly. 


Angie's Testimonial: 

I’ve struggled with my gender ever since I can remember. For years I felt misunderstood and bullied into an identity that never felt right. I have a particularly vivid memory from when I was ten years old. I was playing shirtless on a slip-n-slide with my family and close friends. While running around shirtless, one of the adults shouted "what're you gonna do when you get boobs?"! It took me about half a second to reply "I'm gonna have to cut them off!" and continue to run around unfazed about my solution.


As I continued to grow, so did my gender dysphoria. Feeling comfortable in my body was a privilege that I left behind with the slip-n-slide. I couldn't believe I was supposed to wear dresses and barrettes. Adults often told me to slow down and be careful while letting the boys run and jump as high as they wanted. In elementary school my teachers would tell the class I was a girl and not to confuse me for a boy. My androgyny made adults so uncomfortable. Some screamed while others publicly humiliated me.


Eventually I started listening. I was 14 when I began to assimilate, to force myself into a feminine role,  and the clothing that the people around me so desperately needed me to assume. Unsurprisingly, this did not solve the problem. In fact, the process began a painful isolation from my own body.

It’s taken me 20 years to feel in my body again; 20 years to actually want to be in my body again. I have overcome some of my body dysphoria by binding my chest (as many of you know), but it is only a temporary solution. I am happier and healthier than ever, but still feel like I need to make some changes so that I may feel at home in my body again. I am planning to have chest surgery- a gender confirmation surgery where my breast tissue will be removed.

I’ve found a doctor in Florida that I feel very comfortable with, and I am beyond ready to take the step of getting top surgery – this step that I’ve know I’d need since I was 10 years old. I know I am going to continue to rely on your emotional support, and now I am also asking you to support me financially. Any contribution you can make will leave me eternally grateful.

story:
The Project -

We are a team of two individuals with a common dream of riding in some of the most extreme conditions in the Himalayas. Chasing this dream, we aim to be the first men ever to ride on the entire frozen Zanskar river in Ladakh, a high altitude plateau in the Western Himalayas. We also aim to be the first cyclists ever to climb some of the highest passes of the world in Winter. We will be making a feature documentary of the entire expedition. We will also highlight how the local villagers live in these extreme conditions, cut off from the rest of the world for close to 6 months.

Why is this project special?

The expedition happens in extreme conditions. The average temperature in Ladakh in winter is -15'C and goes down as low as -40'C. Add to that we will be riding at high altitude. The ride goes from 11,500ft to 18,300ft through the 600Km journey. No cyclist has ever attempted this feat just because of the sheer difficulty in terms of terrain and temperatures.



Who are we?

We are passionate cyclists from Bangalore, India who simply love riding in the mountains. We have been working on this project for the last year and have done a reccee of the same. Both of us have ridden on this terrain in summer and are extremely excited about taking it on in the winters.  After all, we are looking to push the limits of mountain biking in India.



Team -

Rajesh P Nayak -
He is one of the few riders in India who has cycled in remote corners of Himalayas. His Himalayan journey started with his self-supported 650km ride in Spiti Valley in Himachal Pradesh. And a year later he did a 1200km self-supported ride in Leh-Ladakh Himalaya where he climbed a total of 8 high altitude passes and reached a high point of 18,300ft in 2012. This year, he became the first and the only self-supported solo cyclist to reach Gurdongmar Lake (17,100ft) in Sikkim - Eastern Himalaya. 


Sharath Vishnu -
A 20 year old student who is extremely passionate about the Himalayas is a mountaineer with Basic and Advance Mountaineering Course in Asia's top mountain school. He has ridden in Ladakh and Himachal Pradesh in 2012 and recently summitted Mt.DKD-II (18,700ft) in the Garhwal Himalayas. He is also a Marathoner. His adventures are documented at www.mountain-kid.com

Prashanth Nayaka  -
He is a professional nature and wild-life film maker who is extremely talented. His attention to detail and great photography knowledge makes him the best person to be on our ride. His recent work 'The Unsung' has been aired around the world and has received great reviews.  

Why do we need the funds?

  • An expedition of this magnitude requires a lot of money and we have put in a lot of our own funds. But are falling short of the required budget as we need some of the best equipment and logistical support to undertake this expedition as we will be operating in extreme sub-zero temperatures day in and day out for 26 days.
  • Our major expenditure goes in Food, Travel & Accommodation. 
    - Food & Ration for 3 people - $1700 (for 26 Days)
    - Accommodation & Tentage - $2700 (for 26 Days)
    - Travel (Flights and other local transport) - $2100
  • We will be borrowing some of the winter gears and other photography equipments from our friends for the expedition.
  • We have some exciting perks for you too! We will get to capture some rare photos of some of the most stunning landscapes on earth. Add to that the video footage that we will produce using drones shot by professionals.


The Impact -

We want to be the guys who open the doors for exploration in the Himalayas in the most difficult season, the winters. And tell the world that with precised planning and managing risk, anyone can venture deep into these big mountains in winters.

Cycling in the Himalayas are limited only to the 4 months of fair weather. But what about the remaining months? This project is all about showing the world that difficult terrain and temperatures should not hinder exploration in this amazing mountain range on a bike.


Risks & Challenges -

  • There are certain risks on this expeditions which is beyond our control. Mountain hazards like Altitude Sickness (AMS), Ice/Snow conditions and weather turbulences in high altitude will be the major risks.
  •  We are fully prepared to handle these risks both in terms of making the right decisions while it matters as well as in terms of having the right equipment and the skill to overcome the risk factor.
  •  We both have been going to the Himalayas for the last 5 years and have been to Ladakh more than 3 times. All these expeditions have been self-supported and hence we have both knowledge and experience to handle these risks.


Other Ways You Can Help -

We are doing this expedition to tell the world that extraordinary journeys can be undertaken by folks like us. You can help us by sharing this not just to help us raise funds but to motivate more people to take up journeys like these.

story:
Hello everyone!

First and foremost... thank you! Thank you for taking the time to read this and know my story. Just the opportunity to be heard is a blessing at this point in my life. My name is Sean Purdom. I'm 26 years old and live in Knoxville, TN. I'm currently unable to work due to some health issues that have been holding me back for the last 4.5 years of my life. I have an umbilical hernia that's said to be half the size of a basketball the last time I went to the doctor. Now I know most of you must be thinking a hernia shouldn't be that bad of a fix. What makes my situation so different is not only do I have a large hernia, but I also have other health issues built up on top of it... including a rare disease that causes lymphodemia which has in turn cause a large growth in the groin area (with the growth exceeding 50lbs). Also, I have excess water weight in the legs that has been pushing against and causing problems with my muscles and also in my chest surrounding a weak heart which can lead to congestive heart falure. I have damage to my knees from having falls, which has left me nearly immobile. Not being able to get around only worsens my health issues due to gaining more and more weight. Being a heavy set guy  in the first place doesn't make it any easier. -- these conditions mixed with a massive hernia makes it 100 times worse, not to mention impossible to do surgery on. Before you say thing or judge me, please understand I'm not asking for a handout... but after seeing countless doctors that don't know how to help me with my lack of insurance, this is my call for help. 

How you can help

Any monetary donations would be a miracle, no matter how small. The money would allow me to get a special exercise machine that will help me strengthen my heart and lose weight little by little in order to have a better chance at surviving an operation. That's my priority. I need to get healthy enough to be able to have my operations. To put it simply... if I don't, I won't make it. That's the honest truth. I need your help! Any money left over would go to paying for medications and doctor visits which at the moment I'm not able to afford, and for transportation to and from doctors. At the moment my only source of transportation is my mother, who currently lives an hour away. So please, even if it's a dollar, every penny is needed and so greatly appreciated. Even if you can't donate money... prayers and just getting the word about about my story is something I'm thankful for.  Just for taking the time to read this, thank you! 

If you have any questions or concerns regarding Sean's situation, please feel free to contact him at tr1pp575@live.com

story:
My brave, loving and talented friend Thomas "Ambush" Donley needs everyone's help! He currently cannot afford his daily pain medication and costs of surgery and treatment. He has applied to any and all health insurances including Obamacare and is still awaiting word back from them. He was diagnosed with a cancerous brain tumor that is about the size of lime and on January 10th surgeons removed most of it. He is undergoing treatment and chemotherapy now and can use all the financial help he can get for these massive medical bills. Despite all of this bad news he is still somehow in great spirits and finding the bright side of things. He has 2 sons he loves very much that need him and that he is an amazing father to. Please contribute anything you can... literally. Any amount is better than nothing. PAYPAL and CHECK MAILED TO HIS HOUSE are preferred so he can access the money immediately and use that for his daily pain medications he cannot afford. For those that are mailing checks, please make the check out to "Thomas Donley" and mail it to this address...

Thomas Donley

2810 Maple Grove Drive

Rex, GA 30273

                                                Thank you and God bless,

                                                                            Duke Stephenson

story:
"Because I see what people can't"


We can't see indoor air pollution until it's too late. That's why we created Foobot (formerly Alima).

Foobot is an Indoor Air Quality Monitor designed to help you take control of your closest environment. 

With a first reading on the device your will be able to know in an instant if your air is polluted or not. Then, on the mobile app, you will be able to:

- Access to your historical data and tag pollution peaks

- Get notified when crossing a threshold, defined by the World Health Organization

- Get warned from future pollution peaks.


DEVICE


Pollutants detected:

  • VOC: total Volatile Organic Compounds, including gases such as Formaldehyde, Benzene, Toluene, Ethylene glycol, etc.)
  • PM: Particulate Matter (PM2.5)
  • CO2: Carbon Dioxide
  • CO: Carbon Monoxide
  • T: Temperature
  • H: Humidity


MOBILE APP


Dashboard

 


Charts


Tagging a pollution peak


Foobot is now available on different marketplaces and shops!

Have a safe breathing day,

The Foobot Team.

story:
As featured in:


Update #1 - Super Reliable Skype Demo!


Update #2 - Super Fast Speedtest.net Demo!





The Multipath router revolutionizes the way we watch Internet TV, the way we use Skype, the way we connect to the internet. Combine connections and instantaneously stream multiple movies and TV shows. Communicate with confidence and forget the frustrations of dropped Skype calls. 

- Turbo-charge Netflix / Apple TV / YouTube. Stop waiting for your Internet TV to load!

- Never drop a Skype call again! Super reliable Skype / Viber / Fring / Talkatone. No more dropped VoIP calls

- Plug and play in minutes! No additional software is needed on your laptop, PC, phone or tablet. Simply connect to your Multipath router and get Skyping, streaming and surfing with confidence



- Add any combination of technologies:- DSL, cable, 3G, 4G or wireless

- Combine links up to an insanely fast 100Mb/s

- Cheapest pipe first. Fill cheap links to capacity before more expensive cellular links are utilized

- Deliver speed to any device! Laptop / PC / Tablet / Phone / Windows / Mac / Linux / iOS / Android

- Combine speeds and reliability

- Charge your phone while turbo-charging your internet

Use our simple 6 step plan to double the speed of your internet connection without paying a single cent to your provider!

1) Invite your neighbor over for a BBQ / beer
2) Moan about how much your Internet provider charges
3) Tell them about the Multipath router
4) Ask if you can connect to their wireless router
5) Tell them to get a Multipath router so you can return the favor
6) Start streaming super clear HD TV in super quick time!
 
Only spare bandwidth will be used so it will not slow your existing connection. Stream Super HD without paying a single extra cent to your provider!

Some providers charge an extra $20 / month just to upgrade from 15 to 20Mb/s. That's crazy! Your already paying for Cable, DSL, 3G phone or 4G Mi-Fi. Just combine their speeds with the Multipath router and get much more without paying a single cent extra! Don't pay more, use what you pay for!


Step 1 : Plug your existing DSL, cable or fixed wireless internet connection into the Multipath router. If you have a second connection, plug it in too. The Multipath router will automatically configure each device.

Step 2 : Plug the USB cable from your cell phone or cell docking station into any of the USB ports on your Multipath router. If you have a second cell phone, plug it into the second USB port. Enable tethering on your phone and place it in the docking station. The Multipath router will automatically configure each device.

Step 3 : Plug your mini wireless receiver into any of the USB ports on your Multipath router. Configure it through the super easy web interface to connect to your Mi-Fi or personal hotspot. 

That's it, as easy as 1, 2, 3. Sit back and be blown away by the speed of the connectivity you are already paying for combined into a single super fast connection.

Under the hood it works in exactly the same way as a regular router, but with multiple Internet connections. The router sends traffic down each interface to our array of aggregating servers. These then put the packets back in the right order and send them on their way. The net result is that data, even a single stream, is sent across all your links. The combined links appear to connected devices as a single, fast, reliable internet connection, with the speed of all links combined.

Convinced? Pledge now and together we'll make this a reality!


We want to deliver a number of important, innovative and really cool features through this Indiegogo project.

The bonding engine has already been developed and has numerous successful deployments. But now it is time to bring this amazing product to the mass market. To do this we will deliver the following :-

-  Amazon AWS Image

We maintain an array of aggregating servers, but we also understand people want to use their own servers. We will package and release an Amazon AWS Image which will be available on the Amazon market place for free!

-  Wireless & USB tethering

Complete the development of our wireless and USB tethering software. This software will enable your Multipath router to talk with iOS, Android or MiFi using USB or wireless tethering. No software will be required on your phone or tablet, simply enable tethering on the device.

-  Locate Aggregating Servers!

Every time you donate, we make a decision on where to locate our servers. If more than 50 people from any locality sign for any pledge level, we will put a server as close as humanly possible to you!

Justin Collery

John Ronan

Kristian Walsh



Thank you for your support. We appreciate you taking the time to watch our video, to read our story and for some of you to pledge your hard-earned cash.

- Deliver speed to any device! Laptop / PC / Tablet / Phone / Windows / Mac / Linux / iOS / Android
- Combine speeds and reliability
- Charge your phone while turbo-charging your internet

Use our simple 6 step plan to double the speed of your internet connection without paying a single cent to your provider!1) Invite your neighbor over for a BBQ / beer2) Moan about how much your Internet provider charges3) Tell them about the Multipath router4) Ask if you can connect to their wireless router 5) Tell them to get a Multipath router so you can return the favor6) Start streaming super clear HD TV in super quick time!  Only spare bandwidth will be used so it will not slow your existing connection. Stream Super HD without paying a single extra cent to your provider!
Some providers charge an extra $20 / month just to upgrade from 15 to 20Mb/s. That's crazy! Your already paying for Cable, DSL, 3G phone or 4G Mi-Fi. Just combine their speeds with the Multipath router and get much more without paying a single cent extra! Don't pay more, use what you pay for!

Step 1 : Plug your existing DSL, cable or fixed wireless internet connection into the Multipath router. If you have a second connection, plug it in too. The Multipath router will automatically configure each device.Step 2 : Plug the USB cable from your cell phone or cell docking station into any of the USB ports on your Multipath router. If you have a second cell phone, plug it into the second USB port. Enable tethering on your phone and place it in the docking station. The Multipath router will automatically configure each device.Step 3 : Plug your mini wireless receiver into any of the USB ports on your Multipath router. Configure it through the super easy web interface to connect to your Mi-Fi or personal hotspot. That's it, as easy as 1, 2, 3. Sit back and be blown away by the speed of the connectivity you are already paying for combined into a single super fast connection.Under the hood it works in exactly the same way as a regular router, but with multiple Internet connections. The router sends traffic down each interface to our array of aggregating servers. These then put the packets back in the right order and send them on their way. The net result is that data, even a single stream, is sent across all your links. The combined links appear to connected devices as a single, fast, reliable internet connection, with the speed of all links combined.Convinced? Pledge now and together we'll make this a reality! 
We want to deliver a number of important, innovative and really cool features through this Indiegogo project.The bonding engine has already been developed and has numerous successful deployments. But now it is time to bring this amazing product to the mass market. To do this we will deliver the following :--  Amazon AWS ImageWe maintain an array of aggregating servers, but we also understand people want to use their own servers. We will package and release an Amazon AWS Image which will be available on the Amazon market place for free!-  Wireless & USB tetheringComplete the development of our wireless and USB tethering software. This software will enable your Multipath router to talk with iOS, Android or MiFi using USB or wireless tethering. No software will be required on your phone or tablet, simply enable tethering on the device.-  Locate Aggregating Servers!Every time you donate, we make a decision on where to locate our servers. If more than 50 people from any locality sign for any pledge level, we will put a server as close as humanly possible to you!
